 995  8E99                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 8E99              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 8E99              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 8E99              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 8E99              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 8E99 ED 4B 79 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 8E9D 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 8E9E 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 8E9F 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 8EA0 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 8EA1 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 8EA2 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 8EA4 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 8EA6 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 8EA7 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 8EA9 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 8EAA E5           		push	hl
  17+ 8EAB 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 8EAD 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 8EAE 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 8EAF CD 42 A8     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 8EB2 22 90 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 8EB5 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 8EB7 32 97 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 8EBA E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 8EBB              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 8EBB ED 4B 7B C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 8EBF 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 8EC0 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 8EC1 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 8EC2 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 8EC3 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 8EC4 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 8EC5 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 8EC7 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 8EC9 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 8ECA E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 8ECC 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 8ECD E5           		push	hl
  39+ 8ECE 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 8ED0 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 8ED1 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 8ED2 CD 42 A8     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 8ED5 22 92 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 8ED8 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 8EDA 32 96 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 8EDD E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 8EDE              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 8EDE ED 4B 7D C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 8EE2 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 8EE3 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 8EE4 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 8EE5 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 8EE6 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 8EE7 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 8EE8 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 8EEA DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 8EEC 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 8EED E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 8EEF 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 8EF0 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 8EF2 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 8EF3 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 8EF4 CD 42 A8     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 8EF7 22 94 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 8EFA DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 8EFC 32 98 8E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 8EFF              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 8EFF 2A 90 8E     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 8F02 ED 5B 92 8E  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 8F06 ED 4B 96 8E  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 8F0A              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 8F0A 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 8F0B 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 8F0C AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 8F0D 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 8F0E 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 8F0F CD C3 AD     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 8F12 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 8F13 3A 98 8E     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 8F16 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 8F17 ED 5B 94 8E  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 8F1B 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 8F1C 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 8F1E CD C3 AD     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 8F21 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 8F22              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 8F22
  88+ 8F22              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 8F22              ;...X cell
  90+ 8F22 21 4C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 8F25 CD 99 8E             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 8F28 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 8F29 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 8F2A B0           		or		b
  95+ 8F2B 32 80 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 8F2E 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 8F2F 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 8F32              ;...Y cell
  99+ 8F32 21 54 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 8F35 CD 99 8E             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 8F38 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 8F39 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 8F3A              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 8F3A B0           		or		b
 105+ 8F3B 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 8F3E 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 8F3F 32 81 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 8F42              ;...Z cell
 109+ 8F42 21 5C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 8F45 CD 99 8E             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 8F48 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 8F49 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 8F4A              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 8F4A B0           		or		b
 115+ 8F4B 32 84 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 8F4E 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 8F4F 32 83 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 8F52 C9                   ret

 120+ 8F53              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 8F53              ;...X cell

 123+ 8F56 CD 99 8E             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 8F59 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 8F5A 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 8F5B B0           		or		b

 128+ 8F5F 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 8F60 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 8F63              ;...Y cell

 137+ 8F6C 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 8F6F 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 8F70 32 81 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for

 152+ 8F84              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high

 156+ 8F8A 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 8F8B 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 8F8C B0           		or		b
 159+ 8F8D 32 80 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 8F90 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 8F91 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 8F94              ;...Y cell

 166+ 8F9B 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 8F9C              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 8F9C B0           		or		b
 169+ 8F9D 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7

 998  902D                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 902D 06 09        ScaleXX16Matrix197:     ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   2+ 902F 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   3+ 9031 21 34 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   4+ 9034 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   5+ 9035 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
   6+ 9036 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
   7+ 9037 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
   8+ 9038 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
   9+ 9039 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  10+ 903B DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  11+ 903D                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  11+ 903D CB 23       >			   sla e
  11+ 903F CB 12       >			   rl  d
  12+ 9041 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  13+ 9042 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  14+ 9043 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  15+ 9044 CD C2 A9                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  16+ 9047 E1                                   pop		hl
  17+ 9048 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  18+ 9049 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  19+ 904A 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  20+ 904B                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  21+ 904B                                  ;    and     $80
  22+ 904B DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  23+ 904D 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  24+ 904E C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  25+ 904F 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  26+ 9050 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  27+ 9052 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9053
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 999  9053
1000  9053                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 9053              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 9053              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 9053              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 9053              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 9053
   6+ 9053              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 9053              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 9053
   9+ 9053 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 9054 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  11+ 9057 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 9058 F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 905A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 905B E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 905D 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 905E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 905F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 9060 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  19+ 9063 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 9064 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 9065 E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 9067 B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 9068 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 9069 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 906A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 906B CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  27+ 906E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 906F F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 9071 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 9072 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 9073 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 9075 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 9076 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 9077 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  35+ 907A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 907B 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 907C E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 907E B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 907F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 9080 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 9081 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 9082 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  43+ 9085 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 9086 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 9088 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 9089 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 908A F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 908C E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 908E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 908F 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 9090 C9                                   ret
  52+ 9091
  53+ 9091 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 9092 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  55+ 9095 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 9097 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 9099 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 909A E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 909C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 909D E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 909F 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 90A0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 90A1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 90A2 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  65+ 90A5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 90A6 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 90A7 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 90A9 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 90AA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 90AB 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 90AC EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 90AD CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  73+ 90B0 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 90B2 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 90B4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 90B5 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 90B7 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 90B8 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 90B9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 90BB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 90BC EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 90BD CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  83+ 90C0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 90C1 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 90C2 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 90C4 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 90C5 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 90C6 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 90C7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 90C8 CD 40 9C                             call    doRND
  91+ 90CB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 90CC F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 90CE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 90CF 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 90D0 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 90D2 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 90D4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 90D5 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 90D6 C9                                   ret
 100+ 90D7
 101+ 90D7              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 90D7 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 90D8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 90DA 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 90DB AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 90DC                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 90DC FA 0A 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 90DF 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 90E0 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 90E1                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 90E1 FA EB 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 90E4 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 90E5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 90E7                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 90E7 FA FE 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 90EA C9                                   ret
 114+ 90EB 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 90EC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 90EE 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 90EF 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 90F0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 90F2 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 90F3 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 90F4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 90F6                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 90F6 FA FE 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 90F9 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 90FA F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 90FC 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 90FD C9                                   ret
 127+ 90FE              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 90FE AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 90FF 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 9100 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 9101 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 9102 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 9103 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 9104 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9105 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9107 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 9108 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 9109 C9                                   ret
 133+ 910A B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 910B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 910C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 910E 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 910F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 9110 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 9112 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 9113 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 9114 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9115 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9116 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9117 C9                                   ret
 145+ 9118
 146+ 9118 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 9119 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 911B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 911C AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 911D                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 911D FA 35 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 9120 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 9121 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9122                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9122 FA 27 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9125 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9126 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9127 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 9128 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 912A 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 912B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 912C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 912E 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 912F 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 9130 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9132 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9133 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9134 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9135 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9136 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 9138 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 9139 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 913A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 913C 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 913D B7                                   or      a
 174+ 913E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 9140 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9142 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9143 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9144 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9145 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9146              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9146 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9147 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 9148 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 9149 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 914A 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 914B 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 914C 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 914D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 914F B4                                   or      h
 184+ 9150 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 9151 C9                                   ret
 186+ 9152              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 9152 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 9154 78                                   ld      a,b
 189+ 9155 32 DA 98                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 190+ 9158 21 27 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 191+ 915B CD 53 90     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 192+ 915E 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 193+ 9160 C9                                   ret
 194+ 9161              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 195+ 9161 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 196+ 9163 78                                   ld      a,b
 197+ 9164 32 DA 98                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 198+ 9167 21 27 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 199+ 916A CD 91 90     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 200+ 916D 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 201+ 916F C9                                   ret
 202+ 9170              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 203+ 9170              DustForward:            ; break
 204+ 9170 3A DA 98                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 205+ 9173 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 206+ 9174 FD 21 27 9A                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 207+ 9178 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 208+ 9179 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 209+ 917C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 210+ 917D 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 211+ 917F 3A BB 97                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 212+ 9182 FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ 9184 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 214+ 9186 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 215+ 9187 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 216+ 9188 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 217+ 918A CD 36 AA                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 218+ 918D                                      ShiftHLRight1
 218+ 918D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 218+ 918F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 219+ 9191                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 219+ 9191 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 219+ 9193 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 220+ 9195 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 221+ 9196 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 222+ 9198 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 223+ 919A FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 223+ 919E 66 05
 224+ 91A0 ED 5B BC 97                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 225+ 91A4 CD D7 90                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 226+ 91A7                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 226+ 91A7 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 226+ 91A9 C2 FE 92    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 227+ 91AC FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 227+ 91B0 74 05
 228+ 91B2 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 228+ 91B6 66 01
 229+ 91B8 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 230+ 91B9 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 231+ 91BB 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 232+ 91BC DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 233+ 91BE ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 234+ 91C0 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 235+ 91C1 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 236+ 91C3 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 237+ 91C4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 238+ 91C5 CD 18 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 239+ 91C8 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 91C9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 241+ 91CB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 241+ 91CB FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 241+ 91CD D2 FE 92    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 242+ 91D0 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 242+ 91D4 74 01
 243+ 91D6 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 243+ 91DA 66 03
 244+ 91DC 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 245+ 91DD E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 246+ 91DF 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 247+ 91E0 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 248+ 91E2 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 249+ 91E4 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 250+ 91E5 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 251+ 91E7 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 252+ 91E8 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 253+ 91E9 CD 18 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 254+ 91EC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255+ 91ED E6 7F                                and     $7F
 256+ 91EF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 256+ 91EF FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 256+ 91F1 D2 FE 92    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 257+ 91F4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 258+ 91F5 E6 80                                and     $80
 259+ 91F7 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 260+ 91F9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 261+ 91FA                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 261+ 91FA FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 261+ 91FC D2 FE 92    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 262+ 91FF FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 262+ 9203 74 03
 263+ 9205              ; Now roll
 264+ 9205              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 265+ 9205 2A CC 96     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 266+ 9208 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267+ 9209 FE 00                                cp      0
 268+ 920B 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 269+ 920D                                      ;break
 270+ 920D                                      ;ld      a,$80
 271+ 920D                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 272+ 920D E5                                   push    hl
 273+ 920E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 274+ 920F E6 80                                and     $80
 275+ 9211 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 276+ 9212 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 277+ 9213 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 278+ 9216 5F                                   ld      e,a
 279+ 9217 E6 80                                and     $80
 280+ 9219 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 281+ 921A 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 282+ 921B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 921D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 284+ 921E ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 285+ 9220 79                                   ld      a,c
 286+ 9221 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 287+ 9222 B2                                   or      d
 288+ 9223 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 289+ 9224 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 289+ 9228 66 01
 290+ 922A CD D7 90                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 291+ 922D FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 291+ 9231 74 01
 292+ 9233              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 293+ 9233              .YRoll:                 ;break
 294+ 9233 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 295+ 9234 7C                                   ld      a,h
 296+ 9235 E6 80                                and     $80
 297+ 9237 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 298+ 9238 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 299+ 9239 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 300+ 923C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 301+ 923D E6 80                                and     $80
 302+ 923F 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 303+ 9240 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 304+ 9241 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 305+ 9243 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 306+ 9244 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 307+ 9246 79                                   ld      a,c
 308+ 9247 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 309+ 9248 B2                                   or      d
 310+ 9249 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 311+ 924A FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 311+ 924E 66 03
 312+ 9250 CD 18 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 313+ 9253 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 313+ 9257 74 03
 314+ 9259 3A BC 96     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 315+ 925C FE 00                                cp      0
 316+ 925E 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 317+ 9260              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 318+ 9260 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 319+ 9261 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 320+ 9264 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 321+ 9265 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 322+ 9267 5F                                   ld      e,a
 323+ 9268 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 324+ 926A                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 324+ 926A CB 23       >			   sla e
 324+ 926C CB 12       >			   rl  d
 325+ 926E 3A BE 96                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 326+ 9271 B2                                   or      d
 327+ 9272 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 328+ 9273 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 328+ 9277 66 03
 329+ 9279 CD 18 91                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 330+ 927C FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 330+ 9280 74 03
 331+ 9282              ; now work out screen pos
 332+ 9282              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 333+ 9282              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 334+ 9282              ;        pop     de
 335+ 9282               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 336+ 9282                                      ;pop     de
 337+ 9282              .NoPitch:
 338+ 9282 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 339+ 9285 6F                                   ld      l,a
 340+ 9286 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 341+ 9288                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 341+ 9288 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 341+ 928A C2 93 92    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 342+ 928D C6 80                                add     a,$80
 343+ 928F 4F                                   ld      c,a
 344+ 9290 C3 98 92                             jp      StarDoneX
 345+ 9293 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 346+ 9294 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 347+ 9296 90                                   sub     b
 348+ 9297 4F                                   ld      c,a
 349+ 9298 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 350+ 929B 6F                                   ld      l,a
 351+ 929C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 352+ 929E                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 352+ 929E CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 352+ 92A0 C2 A9 92    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 353+ 92A3 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 354+ 92A5 47                                   ld      b,a
 355+ 92A6 C3 AE 92                             jp      StarDoneY
 356+ 92A9 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 357+ 92AA 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 358+ 92AC 90                                   sub     b
 359+ 92AD 47                                   ld      b,a
 360+ 92AE 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 361+ 92B0 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 92B1              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 92B1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 92B5 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 92B8 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 92BB C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 92BC                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 92BC FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 366+ 92BE D2 EE 92    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 92C1 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 92C3 0C                                   inc     c
 369+ 92C4 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 92C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 92C5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 371+ 92C9 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 372+ 92CC FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 373+ 92CF C1                                   pop    bc
 374+ 92D0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 374+ 92D0 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 374+ 92D2 D2 EE 92    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 375+ 92D5 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 376+ 92D7 04                                   inc     b
 377+ 92D8 C5                                   push    bc
 378+ 92D9                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 378+ 92D9 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 379+ 92DD CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 380+ 92E0 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 381+ 92E3 C1                                   pop    bc
 382+ 92E4 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 383+ 92E6 0D                                   dec     c
 384+ 92E7                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 384+ 92E7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 385+ 92EB CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 386+ 92EE C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 387+ 92EF FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 388+ 92F1 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 389+ 92F2 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 390+ 92F6 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 391+ 92F7 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 392+ 92F9 05                                   dec     b
 393+ 92FA C2 78 91                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 394+ 92FD C9                                   ret
 395+ 92FE              ResetStar:              ;break
 396+ 92FE                                      ;pop     de
 397+ 92FE C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 398+ 92FF 3A DA 98                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 399+ 9302 90                                   sub     b
 400+ 9303 57                                   ld      d,a
 401+ 9304 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 402+ 9306 ED 30                                mul
 403+ 9308 21 27 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 404+ 930B 19                                   add     hl,de
 405+ 930C CD 53 90                             call    InitStarAtHL
 406+ 930F C3 F6 92                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 407+ 9312              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ 9312 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 409+ 9315 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 410+ 9318 6F                                   ld      l,a
 411+ 9319 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 412+ 931B 47                                   ld      b,a
 413+ 931C CD D9 A9                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 414+ 931F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 415+ 9320                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 415+ 9320 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 415+ 9322 C2 2D 93    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 416+ 9325              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 417+ 9325 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 418+ 9327 26 00                                ld          h,0
 419+ 9329 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 420+ 932A C3 34 93                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 421+ 932D              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 422+ 932D 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 423+ 932F 26 00                                ld          h,0
 424+ 9331                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 9331 B7          >                        or a
 425+ 9332 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 426+ 9334              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 427+ 9334 7D                                   ld          a,l
 428+ 9335 32 7F 9A                             ld          (varStarX),a
 429+ 9338 C9                                   ret
 430+ 9339
 431+ 9339 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 432+ 933C FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 433+ 933F 6F                                   ld          l,a
 434+ 9340 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 435+ 9342 47                                   ld          b,a
 436+ 9343 CD D9 A9                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 437+ 9346 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 438+ 9347                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 438+ 9347 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 438+ 9349 C2 54 93    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 439+ 934C                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 440+ 934C 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 441+ 934E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 441+ 934E B7          >                        or a
 442+ 934F ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 443+ 9351 C3 59 93                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 444+ 9354              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 445+ 9354 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 446+ 9356 26 00                                ld          h,0
 447+ 9358 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 448+ 9359              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 449+ 9359 7D                                   ld          a,l
 450+ 935A 32 80 9A                             ld          (varStarY),a
 451+ 935D C9                                   ret
 452+ 935E
 453+ 935E
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

1006  935E                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 935E
   2+ 935E 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 935F 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9363 7D
   4+ 9364 5E 93        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9366 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 9368 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 936B 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 936D 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9371              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9371
  11+ 9371              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9371              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9371              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9371 32 5E 93     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9374              .set_target:
  16+ 9374 22 6B 93     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 9377              .set_length:
  18+ 9377 ED 53 66 93  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 937B              .write_dma:
  20+ 937B 21 5F 93     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 937E 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 9380 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9382 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9384 C9           	ret
  25+ 9385
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1007  9385                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 9385
   2+ 9385 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 9389 7D
   3+ 938A 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 938C 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 938E 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 9391 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 9393 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 9397              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 9397
  10+ 9397              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 9397              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 9397              .set_target:
  13+ 9397 22 91 93     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 939A              .set_source:
  15+ 939A ED 53 8A 93  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 939E              .set_length:
  17+ 939E ED 43 8C 93  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 93A2              .write_dma:
  19+ 93A2 21 85 93     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 93A5 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 93A7 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 93A9 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 93AB C9           	ret
  24+ 93AC

 223+ 9464              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 224+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 9464              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 9464              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 9464              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 9464              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 9464              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 9464              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 237+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 238+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit

 240+ 9464              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp

 242+ 9464              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 9464
 244+ 9464
 245+ 9464              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 9464 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 9464 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 9464 ~                                JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 249+ 9464                                  ENDM
 250+ 9464
 251+ 9464 21 AC 93     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 9467 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 946A 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 946C CD 71 93                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 946F C9                               ret
 256+ 9470
 257+ 9470 21 D4 93     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 9473 11 DC 93                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 9476 AF                               xor		a
 260+ 9477 FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 947A DD 21 AC 93                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 947E 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 947F 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 9480 13                               inc		de
 265+ 9481 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 9482 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 9483 13                               inc		de
 268+ 9484 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 9486 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 9487 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 9488 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 948A CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 948C 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 948E 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 948F AF                               xor     a
 276+ 9490 C3 9C 94                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 9493 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 9495 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 9496 DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 9499 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 949A E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 949C DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 949F 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 94A0 DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 94A2 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 94A4 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 94A6 FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 94A8 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 94AA C9                               ret
 290+ 94AB
 291+ 94AB              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 94AB ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 94AB ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 94AB ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 94AB ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 94AB ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 94AB ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 94AB ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 94AB                                    ENDM
 300+ 94AB
 301+ 94AB
 302+ 94AB              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 94AB              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 94AB 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 94AE ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 94B0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 94B1 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 94B2 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 94B3 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 94B4 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 94B5 D5                                       push    de
 305+ 94B6 CD 70 94     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 94B9 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 94BA E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 94BB 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 94BC                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 94BC FE 01       >                        cp     1
 309+ 94BE C2 B6 94    >                        jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 94C1 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 94C2 C9                                       ret
 312+ 94C3
 313+ 94C3              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 94C3 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 94C6 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 94C8 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 94C9 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 94CA 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 94CB 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 94CC 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 94CD D5                                       push    de
 315+ 94CE CD 70 94     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 94D1 E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 94D2 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 94D3 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 94D4                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 94D4 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 94D6 DA CE 94    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 94D9 E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 94DA C9                                       ret
 322+ 94DB
 323+ 94DB              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 94DB 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 94DE ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 94E0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 94E1 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 94E2 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 94E3 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 94E4 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 94E5 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 94E6 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 94E7 C9                                       ret
 327+ 94E8
 328+ 94E8              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 94E8 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 94EB ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 94ED 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 94EE 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 94EF 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 94F0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 94F1 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 94F2 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 94F3 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 94F5 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 94F6 C9                                       ret
 333+ 94F7
 334+ 94F7              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 94F7              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 94F7 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 94FA ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 94FC 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 94FD 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 94FE 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 94FF 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9500 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 9501 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 9502 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 9503 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 9505 C9                                       ret
 340+ 9506
 341+ 9506              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 9506              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 9506 21 EC 93    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 9509 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 950B 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 950C 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 950D 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 950E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 950F 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9510 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 9511 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 9512 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 9514 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 9516 C9                                       ret
 348+ 9517
 349+ 9517              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 9517 21 AC 93         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 951A 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 951C 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 951E              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 951E 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 951F FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 9521 CA 2B 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 9524 23               inc     hl
 358+ 9525 0C               inc     c
 359+ 9526 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 9528                  SetAFalse
 360+ 9528 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 361+ 952A C9               ret
 362+ 952B              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 952B 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 952C C9               ret
 365+ 952D
 366+ 952D              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 952D 21 AC 93         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 9530 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 9532 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 9534              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 9534 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 9535 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 9537 FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 9539 CA 43 95         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 953C 23               inc     hl
 376+ 953D 0C               inc     c
 377+ 953E 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 9540                  SetAFalse
 378+ 9540 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 379+ 9542 C9               ret
 380+ 9543              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 9543 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 9544 C9               ret
 383+ 9545
 384+ 9545
 385+ 9545 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 9563 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 9564 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 9565 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 9566 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 9567              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 9567
 392+ 9567              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 9567 21 45 95         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 956A 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 956D FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 956F 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 9571 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 9572 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 9574 ED B0            ldir
 400+ 9576              .NoString
 401+ 9576 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 9578 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 9579 C9               ret
 404+ 957A
 405+ 957A              initInputText:
 406+ 957A AF               xor     a
 407+ 957B 32 64 95         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 957E 32 65 95         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 9581 32 66 95         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 9584 21 45 95         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 9587 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 9589              .wipeloop:
 413+ 9589 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 958A 23               inc     hl
 415+ 958B 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 958D C9               ret
 417+ 958E
 418+ 958E AF           InputName:                  xor     a
 419+ 958F 32 66 95                                 ld      (InputChanged),a
 420+ 9592 CD 17 95                                 call    is_any_key_pressed
 421+ 9595 FE FF                                    cp      $FF
 422+ 9597 C8                                       ret     z
 423+ 9598              .KeyPressed:
 424+ 9598 4F               ld      c,a
 425+ 9599 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 426+ 959C FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 427+ 959E 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 428+ 95A0 21 3C 94         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 429+ 95A3 79               ld      a,c
 430+ 95A4 ED 31            add     hl,a
 431+ 95A6 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 432+ 95A7 FE 41            cp      "A"
 433+ 95A9 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 434+ 95AB              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 435+ 95AB FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 436+ 95AD 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 437+ 95AF FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 438+ 95B1 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 439+ 95B3 FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 440+ 95B5 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 441+ 95B7 FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 442+ 95B9 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 443+ 95BB FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 444+ 95BD 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 445+ 95BF C9               ret
 446+ 95C0              .AlphaPressed:
 447+ 95C0 47               ld      b,a
 448+ 95C1 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 449+ 95C4 4F               ld      c,a
 450+ 95C5 21 45 95         ld      hl,InputString
 451+ 95C8 ED 31            add     hl,a
 452+ 95CA 78               ld      a,b
 453+ 95CB 70               ld      (hl),b
 454+ 95CC 79               ld      a,c
 455+ 95CD 21 64 95         ld      hl,InputCursor
 456+ 95D0 34               inc     (hl)
 457+ 95D1                  SetMemFalse InputChanged
 457+ 95D1 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 457+ 95D3 32 66 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 458+ 95D6 C9               ret
 459+ 95D7              .EnterPressed:
 460+ 95D7 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 461+ 95DA 3C               inc     a
 462+ 95DB 21 45 95         ld      hl,InputString
 463+ 95DE ED 31            add     hl,a
 464+ 95E0 AF               xor     a
 465+ 95E1 77               ld      (hl),a
 466+ 95E2 3D               dec     a
 467+ 95E3 32 65 95         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 468+ 95E6 32 66 95         ld      (InputChanged),a
 469+ 95E9 C9               ret
 470+ 95EA              .CheckShiftDelete:
 471+ 95EA              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 472+ 95EA              .SymbolPressed:
 473+ 95EA              .SpacePressed:
 474+ 95EA 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 475+ 95ED FE 00            cp      0
 476+ 95EF C8               ret     z
 477+ 95F0 3D               dec     a
 478+ 95F1 32 64 95         ld      (InputCursor),a
 479+ 95F4 21 45 95         ld      hl,InputString
 480+ 95F7 ED 31            add     hl,a
 481+ 95F9 AF               xor     a
 482+ 95FA 77               ld      (hl),a
 483+ 95FB                  SetMemFalse InputChanged
 483+ 95FB 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 483+ 95FD 32 66 95    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 484+ 9600 C9               ret
 485+ 9601
 486+ 9601 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 487+ 9602 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 488+ 9605 3A CB 97                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 489+ 9608 E6 FC                                and     $FC
 490+ 960A 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 491+ 960C 2A FA 93     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 492+ 960F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 493+ 9610                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 493+ 9610 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 493+ 9611 CA 1F 96    >                        jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 494+ 9614 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 495+ 9617 F6 80                                or      $80
 496+ 9619 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 497+ 961C C3 55 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 498+ 961F 2A F8 93     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 499+ 9622 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 500+ 9623                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 500+ 9623 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 500+ 9624 CA 55 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 501+ 9627 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 502+ 962A F6 40                                or      $40
 503+ 962C 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 504+ 962F C3 55 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 505+ 9632 2A 36 94     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 506+ 9635 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 9636                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 507+ 9636 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 507+ 9637 CA 45 96    >                        jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 508+ 963A 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 963D F6 80                                or      $80
 510+ 963F 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 9642 C3 55 96                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 9645 2A 38 94     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 513+ 9648 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 514+ 9649                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 514+ 9649 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 514+ 964A CA 55 96    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 515+ 964D 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 516+ 9650 F6 40                                or      $40
 517+ 9652 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 518+ 9655 2A F4 93     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 519+ 9658 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 520+ 9659                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 520+ 9659 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 520+ 965A CA 66 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRightKey
 521+ 965D 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 522+ 9660 F6 20                                or      $20
 523+ 9662 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 524+ 9665 C9                                   ret
 525+ 9666 2A F6 93     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 526+ 9669 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 527+ 966A                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 527+ 966A A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 527+ 966B CA 77 96    >                        jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 528+ 966E 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 529+ 9671 F6 10                                or      $10
 530+ 9673 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 531+ 9676 C9                                   ret
 532+ 9677 2A 14 94     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 533+ 967A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 534+ 967B                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 534+ 967B A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 534+ 967C CA 88 96    >                        jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 535+ 967F 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 536+ 9682 F6 08                                or      $08
 537+ 9684 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 538+ 9687 C9                                   ret
 539+ 9688 2A 30 94     ScanRecentreKey:        ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 540+ 968B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 541+ 968C                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 541+ 968C A7          >                        and a
 541+ 968D C8          >                        ret    z
 542+ 968E 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 543+ 9691 F6 04                                or      $04
 544+ 9693 32 C9 97                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 545+ 9696 C9                                   ret

 371+ 98E4              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 372+ 98E4              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 373+ 98E4              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 374+ 98E4              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 375+ 98E4              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 376+ 98E4              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 377+ 98E4              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
