# file opened: ./Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm
   1+ 9B4D AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   2+ 9B4E 21 33 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
   3+ 9B51 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseListSize * 2
   4+ 9B53 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9B54 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 9B55 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 9B57 C9                                   ret
   8+ 9B58
   9+ 9B58              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  10+ 9B58              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  11+ 9B58 CD 4D 9B     CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  12+ 9B5B 21 33 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  13+ 9B5E 11 27 98                             ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  14+ 9B61 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  15+ 9B63 1A           .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  16+ 9B64 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  17+ 9B66 28 06                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  18+ 9B68 77           .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  19+ 9B69 23                                   inc     hl
  20+ 9B6A 36 01                                ld      (hl),1
  21+ 9B6C 23                                   inc     hl
  22+ 9B6D 23                                   inc     hl
  23+ 9B6E 13           .SkipSlot               inc     de
  24+ 9B6F 10 F2                                djnz    .fillLoop
  25+ 9B71 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9B72              ; Wipe all items
  27+ 9B72 3E FF        ClearUnivSlotList:      ld      a,$FF
  28+ 9B74 21 27 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  29+ 9B77 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseListSize
  30+ 9B79 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
  31+ 9B7A 23                                   inc     hl
  32+ 9B7B 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
  33+ 9B7D C9                                   ret
  34+ 9B7E
  35+ 9B7E 21 27 98     SetSlot0ToSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  36+ 9B81 36 02                                ld      (hl),ShipTypeStation
  37+ 9B83 C9                                   ret
  38+ 9B84
  39+ 9B84 21 27 98     SetSlotAToTypeB:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  40+ 9B87 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  41+ 9B89 70                                   ld      (hl),b
  42+ 9B8A C9                                   ret
  43+ 9B8B
  44+ 9B8B              ; Clears all except slot A, used when say restarting a space station post launch
  45+ 9B8B 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  46+ 9B8C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  47+ 9B8E 21 27 98                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  48+ 9B91 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseListSize
  49+ 9B93 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c
  50+ 9B94 BA                                   cp      d
  51+ 9B95 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  52+ 9B97 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  53+ 9B99 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  54+ 9B9A 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  55+ 9B9B 10 F6                                djnz    .fillLoop
  56+ 9B9D C9                                   ret
  57+ 9B9E
  58+ 9B9E 21 27 98     SetSlotAOccupiedByB:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  59+ 9BA1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  60+ 9BA3 78                                   ld      a,b
  61+ 9BA4 70                                   ld      (hl),b
  62+ 9BA5 C9                                   ret
  63+ 9BA6
  64+ 9BA6              ; Space Station will always be slot 0
  65+ 9BA6
  66+ 9BA6 21 27 98     FindSpaceStationSlotInC:ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  67+ 9BA9 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  68+ 9BAB 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  69+ 9BAD 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  70+ 9BAE                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation, .FoundSlot
  70+ 9BAE FE 02       >                        cp     ShipTypeStation
  70+ 9BB0 CA B9 9B    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
  71+ 9BB3 0C                                   inc     c
  72+ 9BB4 23                                   inc     hl
  73+ 9BB5 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
  74+ 9BB7                                      SetCarryFlag
  74+ 9BB7 37          >                        scf
  75+ 9BB8 C9                                   ret
  76+ 9BB9              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
  76+ 9BB9 B7          >                        or a
  77+ 9BBA C9                                   ret
  78+ 9BBB
  79+ 9BBB 21 27 98     GetTypeAtSlotA:         ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  80+ 9BBE ED 31                                add     hl,a
  81+ 9BC0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  82+ 9BC1 C9                                   ret
  83+ 9BC2
  84+ 9BC2 21 28 98     IsPlanetOrSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList+1
  85+ 9BC5 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  86+ 9BC6 C9                                   ret
  87+ 9BC7
  88+ 9BC7 21 27 98     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  89+ 9BCA 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseListSize
  90+ 9BCC 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
  91+ 9BCE 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  92+ 9BCF                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
  92+ 9BCF FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
  92+ 9BD1 CA DA 9B    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
  93+ 9BD4 0C                                   inc     c
  94+ 9BD5 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 9BD6 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
  96+ 9BD8                                      SetCarryFlag
  96+ 9BD8 37          >                        scf
  97+ 9BD9 C9                                   ret
  98+ 9BDA              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
  98+ 9BDA B7          >                        or a
  99+ 9BDB C9                                   ret
 100+ 9BDC

1017  9C3F                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9C3F              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9C3F              doRND2:
   3+ 9C3F A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9C40              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9C40              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9C40 3A A7 96     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9C43 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9C45 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9C46 21 A9 96     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9C49 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9C4A 32 A7 96     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9C4D 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9C4E 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9C4F 32 A9 96                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9C52 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9C53 3A A8 96                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9C56 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9C57 21 AA 96     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9C5A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9C5B 32 A8 96                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9C5E 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9C5F 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9C60 32 AA 96                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9C63 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9C64 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9C65
  27+ 9C65              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9C65 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9C67 21 04 C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9C6A              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9C6A              EE55:
  32+ 9C6A CD 40 9C     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9C6D 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9C6E 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9C6F 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9C71 C9               ret
  37+ 9C72
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 9C72 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9C76 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9C7A 45 44
   2+ 9C7C 21 CE 98     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9C7F 11 AB 97                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9C82 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 9C84 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 9C86 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9C88 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9C8A ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9C8C ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9C8E C9                                   ret
  11+ 9C8F
  12+ 9C8F 21 AB 97     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9C92 11 CE 98                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9C95 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9C97
  16+ 9C97 21 CE 98     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9C9A 11 C2 98                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9C9D 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9C9F
  20+ 9C9F 21 C2 98     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9CA2 11 CE 98                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9CA5 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9CA7
  24+ 9CA7 21 C2 98     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9CAA 11 AB 97                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9CAD 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9CAF
  28+ 9CAF 21 AB 97     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9CB2 11 C2 98                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9CB5 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9CB7
  32+ 9CB7              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9CB7 CD BA 9C     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9CBA              .NextStep:
  35+ 9CBA CD BD 9C     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9CBD              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9CBD 3A AB 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9CC0 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9CC1 21 AD 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9CC4 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9CC5 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9CC6 3A AC 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9CC9 21 AE 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9CCC 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9CCD 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9CCE 3A AD 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9CD1 32 AB 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9CD4 3A AE 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9CD7 32 AC 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9CDA 3A B0 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9CDD 32 AE 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9CE0 3A AF 97     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9CE3 32 AD 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9CE6 B7           		or		a
  55+ 9CE7 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9CE8 21 AD 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9CEB 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9CEC 32 AF 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9CEF 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9CF0 21 AE 97     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9CF3 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9CF4 32 B0 97     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9CF7 C9           		ret
  64+ 9CF8
  65+ 9CF8              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9CF8 CD FB 9C     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9CFB              .NextStep:
  68+ 9CFB CD FE 9C     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9CFE              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9CFE              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9CFE 3A C2 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9D01 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9D02 21 C4 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9D05 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9D06 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9D07              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9D07 3A C3 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9D0A 21 C5 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9D0D 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9D0E 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9D0F 3A C4 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9D12 32 C2 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9D15 3A C5 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9D18 32 C3 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 9D1B 3A C7 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9D1E 32 C5 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9D21 3A C6 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9D24 32 C4 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9D27 B7           		or		a
  90+ 9D28 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 9D29 21 C4 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9D2C 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9D2D 32 C6 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9D30 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9D31 21 C5 98     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9D34 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9D35 32 C7 98     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9D38 C9           		ret
  99+ 9D39
 100+ 9D39 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9D3A 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9D3B 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9D3C
 104+ 9D3C AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9D3D 32 C4 97                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9D40 3A AC 97     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 9D43 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 9D44 3A D5 98     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 9D47 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 9D48 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 9D49 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 9D4A CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 9D4C 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 9D4E ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 9D50 32 3B 9D     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 9D53 ED 5B 39 9D                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 9D57 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 9D58 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 9D5A 3A AE 97     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 9D5D 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 9D5E 3A D4 98                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 9D61 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 9D62 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 9D63 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 9D64 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 9D66 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 9D68 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 9D6A 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 9D6B BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 9D6C 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 9D6E 3A 3B 9D     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 9D71 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 9D72 ED 43 39 9D                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 9D76 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 9D77 CD AF 9C                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 9D7A C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 9D7B 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 9D7C B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 9D7D C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 9D7E CD B7 9C     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 9D81 3A C4 97                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 9D84 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 9D85 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 9D87 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 9D88 32 C4 97                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 9D8B 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 9D8D
 148+ 9D8D              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 9D8D 3A C3 98     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 9D90 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 9D92 32 AF 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 9D95 3A C4 98     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 9D98 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 9D9A CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 9D9C CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 9D9E CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 9DA0 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 9DA2 32 B0 98     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 9DA5 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 9DA7 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 9DA9 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 9DAB              .Fedual:
 163+ 9DAB 3A AF 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 9DAE F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 9DB0 32 AF 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 9DB3              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 9DB3 3A AF 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 9DB6 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 9DB8 32 B1 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 9DBB 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 9DBC 3A C5 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 9DBF E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 9DC1 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 9DC2 32 B1 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 9DC5 3A B0 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 9DC8 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 9DCA 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 9DCB 3A B1 98     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 9DCE 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 9DCF 32 B1 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 9DD2 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 9DD4 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 9DD6 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 9DD7 3A AF 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 9DDA 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 9DDB 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 9DDC 3A B0 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 9DDF 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 9DE0 32 B2 98     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 9DE3 3A AF 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 9DE6 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 9DE8 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 9DEA 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 9DEB 3A B0 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 9DEE C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 9DF0 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 9DF1 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 9DF3 3A B2 98     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 9DF6 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 9DF7 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 9DF9 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 9DFB CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 9DFD CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 9DFF CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 9E01 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 9E03 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 9E05 ED 53 B4 98  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 9E09              .DoRadius:
 209+ 9E09 3A C5 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 9E0C 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 9E0D 3A C7 98     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 9E10 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 9E12 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 9E14 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 9E15 ED 43 B8 98  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 9E19 C9           		ret

  36+ 9F60
  37+ 9F60
  38+ 9F60              getTableText:
  39+ 9F60              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9F60              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9F60 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9F61 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9F63 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9F65 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9F66 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9F67 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9F68 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9F69 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9F6A C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9F6B
  51+ 9F6B
  52+ 9F6B              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9F6B              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9F6B              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9F6B              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9F6B              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9F6B              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9F6B              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9F6B              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9F6B              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9F6B 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9F6C B3           	or		e
  63+ 9F6D FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9F6F C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9F70 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9F71 21 BF 9E     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9F74              .testLoop:
  68+ 9F74 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9F75 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9F76 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9F77 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9F78 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9F79 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9F7A CD 7A AB     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9F7D 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9F7F              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9F7F E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9F80 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9F81 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9F82 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9F83 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9F85              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9F85 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9F86 C9           	ret
  85+ 9F87
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 167+ A3B1 59 A3 5D A3  TextTokens			DW  TextLargeCargoBay, TextEscapePod, TextFuelScoops				; 0 2

 171+ A3CD 89 A3
 172+ A3CF 8C A3 8F A3  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 172+ A3D3 95 A3 92 A3
 172+ A3D7 9E A3 98 A3
 172+ A3DB 9B A3 A1 A3
 173+ A3DF A4 A3        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 174+ A3E1 A7 A3 AB A3  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 175+ A3E5 B0 A3        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 176+ A3E7 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 177+ A408
 178+ A408              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A408              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A408
 181+ A408              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A408              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A408              .CapLoop:
 184+ A408 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A409 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A40A FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A40C C8           	ret		z
 188+ A40D FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A40F 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A411 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A413 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A415              .LowerCase:
 193+ A415 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A417 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A418 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A41A
 197+ A41A              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A41A 21 8B A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A41D ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A41F ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A421 D5           	push	de
 202+ A422 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A423 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A424 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A425 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A426 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A427 C9           	ret
 208+ A428
 209+ A428
 210+ A428              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A428              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A428 21 B1 A3     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A42B CD 60 9F     	call	getTableText
 214+ A42E 11 E7 A3     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A431              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A431 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A432 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A434 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A436 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A437 D5           	push	de
 221+ A438 21 8B A2     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A43B CD 60 9F     	call	getTableText
 223+ A43E D1           	pop		de
 224+ A43F              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A43F 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A440 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A442 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A444              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A444 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A445 13           	inc		de
 231+ A446 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A447 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A449              .AddSpace:
 234+ A449 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A44B 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A44C 13           	inc		de
 237+ A44D E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A44E 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A44F 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A451              .ReadDone:
 241+ A451 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A452 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A453 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A454 C9           	ret
 245+ A455

 218+ A4EF              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A4EF              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A4EF              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A4EF              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A4EF              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A4EF              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A4EF              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A4EF              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A4EF              ;
 227+ A4EF              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A4EF              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A4EF              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A4EF              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A4EF              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A4EF              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A4EF              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A4EF              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A4EF              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A4EF              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A4EF              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A4EF              ;
 239+ A4EF              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A4EF              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A4EF              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A4EF              ;
 243+ A4EF              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A4EF              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A4EF              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A4EF              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A4EF              ;
 248+ A4EF              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A4EF              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF

 251+ A4EF              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?

 268+ A4EF              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.

   1+ A4EF CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
   2+ A4F1 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
   3+ A4F3 CD 90 AB                             call    negate16hl
   4+ A4F6 CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
   5+ A4F8 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
   6+ A4FA CD 97 AB                             call    negate16de
   7+ A4FD 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
   8+ A4FE AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
   9+ A4FF CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  10+ A501 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  11+ A502 CD 90 AB                             call    negate16hl
  12+ A505 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  13+ A507 C9                                   ret

1027  A508                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A508              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A508 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A509 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A50A 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A50B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A50D 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A50E 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A50F ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A511 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A512 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A514 B4                                   or      h
  12+ A515 C9                                   ret
  13+ A516              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A516 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A517 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A518 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A519 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A51B 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A51D EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A51E 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A520 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A521                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A521 B7          >                        or a
  23+ A522 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A524 C9                                   ret
  25+ A525 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A526 ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A528 C9                                   ret
  28+ A529
  29+ A529              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A529 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A52A AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A52B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A52D 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A52F 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A530 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A532 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A534 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A535 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A537 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A538 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A539 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A53B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A53C 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A53D 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A53E 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A53F 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A540 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A541 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A542 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A543 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A544 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A546 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A547 C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A548 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A549 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A54B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A54D 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A54E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A54F FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A551 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A553 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A554 E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A555 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A557 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A559 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A55A 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A55C 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A55E 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A55F                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A55F BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A560 DA 6A A5    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A563 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A565              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A565 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A566 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A567 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A568 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A569 C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A56A              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A56A 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A56B 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A56C 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A56D 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A56E 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A56F 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A570 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A571 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A572 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A573 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A575 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A577 B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A578 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A579 C9                                   ret
  92+ A57A 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A57B 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A57C 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A57D 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A57E 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A57F 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A580 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A581 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A582 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A583 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A585 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A587 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A588 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A589 C9                                   ret
 106+ A58A
 107+ A58A
 108+ A58A              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A58A 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A58B 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A58C A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A58D CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A58F 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A591 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A592 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A593 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A595 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A596 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A597 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A598 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A599 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A59B 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A59C C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A59D
 125+ A59D
 126+ A59D
 127+ A59D              ; a = value to add
 128+ A59D              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A59D              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A59D              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A59D 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A5A0 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A5A1 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A5A2 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A5A4 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A5A5 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A5A7 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A5A8 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A5A9 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A5AB              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A5AB              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A5AB              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A5AB              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A5AB 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A5AC 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A5AD 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A5AE 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A5AF 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A5B0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A5B1 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A5B2 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A5B4 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A5B6              .negativecalc:
 154+ A5B6 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A5B7 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A5B9 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A5BA DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A5BC 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A5BE ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A5C0 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A5C2 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A5C3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A5C4 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A5C6 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A5C8 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A5CA A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A5CB 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A5CC 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A5CD 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A5CE 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A5CF 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A5D0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A5D1 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A5D2              .nocarry:
 175+ A5D2 CD 90 AB             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A5D5 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A5D6 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A5D7 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A5D8 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A5D9 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A5DA 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A5DB 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A5DC EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A5DD C9                   ret
 185+ A5DE              .postivecalc:
 186+ A5DE DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A5E0 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A5E2 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A5E3 EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A5E4 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A5E6 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A5E7 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A5E8 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A5E9 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A5EA 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A5EB C9                   ret
 197+ A5EC
 198+ A5EC              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A5EC              ;MVT1
 200+ A5EC              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A5EC              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A5EC              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A5EC              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A5EC              ;
 205+ A5EC              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A5EC              ;        b = 0
 207+ A5EC              ;        c = varS
 208+ A5EC              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A5EC              ;        retain carry
 210+ A5EC              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A5EC              ;        and 7F
 212+ A5EC              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A5EC              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A5EC              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A5EC              ;
 216+ A5EC              ;    else
 217+ A5EC              ;MV10.
 218+ A5EC              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A5EC              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A5EC
 221+ A5EC
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
1028  A5EC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ A5EC              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A5EC 2A E5 9B     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A5EF 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A5F0 22 E5 9B                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A5F3 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A5F6 2A E7 9B                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A5F9 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A5FB 22 E7 9B                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A5FE C9                                   ret
  10+ A5FF
  11+ A5FF 2A E5 9B     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A602 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A603 B5                                   or      l
  14+ A604 2A E7 9B                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A607 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A608 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A609 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A60A B7                                   or      a
  19+ A60B 2A E5 9B                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A60E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A610 22 E5 9B                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A613 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A616 2A E7 9B                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A619 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A61B 22 E7 9B                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A61E                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A61E CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A620 C2 24 A6    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A623 C9                                   ret
  28+ A624 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A627 22 E5 9B                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A62A 22 E7 9B                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A62D C9                                   ret
