1029  A62E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A62E              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A62E              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A62E 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A62F E5                                   push hl
   5+ A630 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A632 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A634 E5                                   push hl
   8+ A635 AF                                   xor a
   9+ A636 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A637 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A638 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A63A CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A63C ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A63E 17                                   rla
  15+ A63F B9                                   cp c
  16+ A640 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A642 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A644 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A646 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A647 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A649 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A64B 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A64C DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A64E E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A64F 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A650 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A651 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A653 D1                                   pop de
  29+ A654 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A655 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A657 D1                                   pop de
  32+ A658 C9                                   ret
  33+ A659
  34+ A659 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A65B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A65D CD 2E A6                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A660 F5                                   push    af
  38+ A661 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A663 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A665 B1                                   or      c
  41+ A666 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A667 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A668 C9                                   ret
  44+ A669
  45+ A669
  46+ A669 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A66B A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A66C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A66E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A670 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A671 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A673 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A674 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A676 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A678 CD 2E A6                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A67B FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A67D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A67F 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A680 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A682 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A683 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A685 C9                                   ret
  63+ A686
  64+ A686              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A686              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A686              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A686              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A686 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A687 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A689 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A68B 3A BF 97                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A68E 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A68F 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A692 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A693 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A695 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A697 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A698 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A69A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A69C 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A69E 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A69F 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A6A0 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A6A2 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A6A3 32 C0 97                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A6A6 C9                                   ret
  87+ A6A7
  88+ A6A7              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A6A7              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A6A7 32 B0 96     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A6AA                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A6AA 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A6AD 22 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A6B0 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A6B3 32 C1 97                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A6B6 ED 5B AE 96  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A6BA 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A6BB F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A6BD 32 AE 96                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A6C0 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A6C1 3A B0 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A6C4 21 C1 97                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A6C7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A6C8 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A6CA 32 DC 97                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A6CD FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A6D0 3A B0 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A6D3 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A6D5              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A6D5 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A6D7 D2 E5 A6    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A6DA                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A6DA CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A6DC CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ A6DE CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ A6E0 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ A6E2 C2 D5 A6                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ A6E5 32 B0 96     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ A6E8 ED 53 AE 96                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ A6EC 3A C1 97                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ A6EF E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ A6F1                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ A6F1 2A BF 97                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ A6F4 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ A6F6                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ A6F6 CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ A6F8 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ A6FA CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ A6FC F2 F4 A6                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ A6FF 22 BF 97     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ A702 32 BF 97                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ A705 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ A707 32 C0 97                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ A70A 3A B0 96                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ A70D CD 86 A6                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ A710 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ A712 32 D4 97                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ A715 32 D5 97                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ A718 32 D6 97                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ A71B FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ A71D                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ A71D CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ A71F CA 4A A7    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ A722 3A C0 97                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ A725 ED 5B D3 97                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ A729 2A D7 97                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ A72C 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ A72D CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ A72F CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ A731 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ A733 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ A735 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ A737 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ A739 ED 53 D3 97  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ A73D 22 D7 97                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ A740 3A DC 97                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ A743 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ A744 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ A745 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ A746 32 E6 97                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ A749 C9                                   ret
 152+ A74A              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ A74A A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ A74B CA 62 A7    >                        jp	z, DV13
 153+ A74E 3A C0 97                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ A751 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ A753 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ A755 C2 51 A7                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ A758 32 D3 97                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ A75B                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ A75B 3A DC 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 158+ A75E 32 D6 97    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ A761 C9                                   ret
 160+ A762              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ A762 3A C0 97    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 160+ A765 32 D3 97    >                        ld       (varK),a
 161+ A768                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ A768 3A DC 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 161+ A76B 32 D6 97    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ A76E C9                                   ret
 163+ A76F
 164+ A76F
 165+ A76F CD A7 A6     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ A772 3A D6 97                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ A775 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ A777 21 D5 97                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ A77A B6                                   or      (hl)
 170+ A77B C2 90 A7                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 171+ A77E 3A D4 97                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 172+ A781 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ A783 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 174+ A785                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 174+ A785 B7          >                        or a
 175+ A786 2A D3 97                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 176+ A789 3A D6 97                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 177+ A78C CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 178+ A78E C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 179+ A78F C9           PL44:                   ret
 180+ A790 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 181+ A791 C9                                   ret
 182+ A792
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
1030  A792                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A792              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A792 2A C0 97                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A795 3A BF 97                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A798 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A79A 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A79D 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A79E                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A79E CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A7A0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A7A2 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A7A4 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A7A6 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A7A7 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A7A8 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A7A9              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A7A9 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A7AB CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A7AD CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A7AF 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A7B1 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A7B3 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A7B4 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A7B6 C9                                   ret
  20+ A7B7
  21+ A7B7
  22+ A7B7              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A7B7 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A7B7 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A7B7 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A7B7 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A7B7 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A7B7 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A7B7 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A7B7                                      ENDM
  40+ A7B7
  41+ A7B7
  42+ A7B7
  43+ A7B7                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A7B7              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A7B7 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A7B8 3A BF 97    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A7BB 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A7BC AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A7BD E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A7BF 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A7C0 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A7C1 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A7C3 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A7C4 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A7C5 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A7C7 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A7C8 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A7CA 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A7CB B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A7CC 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A7CD 2A C0 97     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A7D0 CD D9 A7                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A7D3 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A7D4                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A7D4 B7          >                        or a
  49+ A7D5 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A7D7 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A7D8 C9                                   ret
  52+ A7D9
  53+ A7D9
  54+ A7D9 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A7DA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A7DC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A7DD AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A7DE                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A7DE FA F6 A7    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A7E1 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A7E2 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A7E3                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A7E3 FA E8 A7    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A7E6 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A7E7 C9                                   ret
  64+ A7E8 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A7E9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A7EB 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A7EC 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A7ED E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A7EF 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A7F0 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A7F1 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A7F3 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A7F4 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A7F5 C9                                   ret
  75+ A7F6 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A7F7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A7F9 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A7FA 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A7FB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A7FD 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A7FE B7                                   or      a
  82+ A7FF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A801 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A803 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A804 B4                                   or      h
  86+ A805 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A806 C9                                   ret
  88+ A807              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A807 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A808 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A809 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A80A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A80B 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A80C 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A80D 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A80E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A810 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A811 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A812 C9                                   ret
  94+ A813
  95+ A813
  96+ A813                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A813                  ;
  98+ A813                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A813                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A813                  ;
 101+ A813                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A813                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A813                  ;
 104+ A813                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A813 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A814 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A815 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A817 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A818 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A81A
 111+ A81A 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A81B 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A81C 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A81D EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A81E
 116+ A81E 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A81F CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A821 C9                                   ret
 119+ A822
 120+ A822
 121+ A822
 122+ A822                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A822                 ;
 124+ A822                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A822                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A822                 ;
 127+ A822                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A822                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A822                 ;
 130+ A822                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A822
 132+ A822
 133+ A822
 134+ A822 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A823 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A824 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A825 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A826 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A827 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A828              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A828 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A82A EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A82B ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A82D
 145+ A82D AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A82E 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A82F 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A830
 149+ A830 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A831 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A832 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A834
 153+ A834 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A835 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A836
 156+ A836 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A837 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A838 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A839 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A83A
 161+ A83A D1                                   pop de
 162+ A83B ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A83D
 164+ A83D EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A83E ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A840 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A841
 168+ A841 C9                                   ret
 169+ A842
 170+ A842              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A842              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A842              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A842              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A842              ;         carry reset
 175+ A842              ; maths is
 176+ A842              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A842              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A842              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A842              ;
 180+ A842              ;
 181+ A842              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A842 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A843 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A844 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A845 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A846 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A847 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A848 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A84A EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A84B ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A84D 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A84E 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A84F 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A850 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A852 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A853 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A854 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A855 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A856                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A856 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A857 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A858 C9                                   ret
 203+ A859
 204+ A859              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 205+ A859 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d
 206+ A85A AC                                   xor     h
 207+ A85B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 208+ A85D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 209+ A85F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 210+ A860 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 211+ A862 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; hle = abs (hle)
 212+ A863 7A                                   ld      a,d
 213+ A864 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 214+ A866 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; now also d = abs d
 215+ A867 ED 30        .PerformMultiply:       mul                         ; de = E*A
 216+ A869 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; c = low E*A
 217+ A86A 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ;
 218+ A86B 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; hl = H,A
 219+ A86C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = (E*A)/256
 220+ A86D 55                                   ld      d,l                 ; de = A,L
 221+ A86E ED 30                                mul                         ; de = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 222+ A870 ED 32                                add     de,a                ; .
 223+ A872 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; hl = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 224+ A873 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; A =  E*A, de = HA
 225+ A874 ED 30                                mul
 226+ A876 ED 32                                add     de,a                ;
 227+ A878 7A                                   ld      a,d
 228+ A879 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover sign
 229+ A87B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; sign back on d
 230+ A87C C9                                   ret
 231+ A87D
 232+ A87D
 233+ A87D              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 234+ A87D              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 235+ A87D              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 236+ A87D              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 237+ A87D              ;         carry reset
 238+ A87D              ;
 239+ A87D              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 240+ A87D 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 241+ A87E AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 242+ A87F 32 7D A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A882 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A883 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A886 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 246+ A888 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A88A 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A88B 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A88D 32 7D A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A890 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 251+ A891 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 252+ A894 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 253+ A896 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 254+ A898 67                                   ld      h,a
 255+ A899 3A 7D A8                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 256+ A89C EE 80                                xor     $80
 257+ A89E 32 7D A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 258+ A8A1 CD 42 A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 259+ A8A4 3A 7D A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 260+ A8A7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 261+ A8AA C8                                   ret     z
 262+ A8AB AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 263+ A8AC 95                                   sub 	l
 264+ A8AD 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 265+ A8AE 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 266+ A8AF 94                                   sub 	h
 267+ A8B0 67                                   ld 		h,a
 268+ A8B1 C9                                   ret
 269+ A8B2
 270+ A8B2 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 271+ A8B3 32 7D A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 272+ A8B6 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 273+ A8B7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 274+ A8BA 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 275+ A8BC E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 276+ A8BE 57                                   ld      d,a
 277+ A8BF 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 278+ A8C1 32 7D A8                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 279+ A8C4 CD 42 A8     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 280+ A8C7 3A 7D A8     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 281+ A8CA ED 27 80                             test    $80
 282+ A8CD C8                                   ret     z
 283+ A8CE AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 284+ A8CF 95                                   sub 	l
 285+ A8D0 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 286+ A8D1 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 287+ A8D2 94                                   sub 	h
 288+ A8D3 67                                   ld 		h,a

1031  A8D5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A8D5              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A8D5              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A8D5
   4+ A8D5              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A8D5 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A8D5 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A8D5 ~            			mul
   8+ A8D5              			ENDM
   9+ A8D5
  10+ A8D5              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A8D5 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A8D5 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A8D5 ~            			mul
  14+ A8D5 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A8D5              			ENDM
  16+ A8D5
  17+ A8D5
  18+ A8D5              asm_squa:
  19+ A8D5 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A8D7              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A8D7              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A8D7              asm_squa2:
  23+ A8D7 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A8D8 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A8D9 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A8DB ED 53 AE 96  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A8DF 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A8E0 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1032  A8E1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A8E1              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A8E1              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A8E1              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A8E1              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A8E1              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A8E1              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A8E1 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A8E4 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A8E5 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A8E6              .sqrloop:
  11+ A8E6 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A8E8 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A8EA 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A8EB EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A8EC ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A8EE 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A8F0 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A8F1 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A8F2 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A8F4              .sqrbit:
  21+ A8F4 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A8F5 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A8F6 B7           	or a
  24+ A8F7 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A8F9              .sqrfi:
  26+ A8F9 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A8FB CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A8FD CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A8FF CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A901 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A903 C9           	ret
  32+ A904
  33+ A904
  34+ A904              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A904 3A BF 97     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A907 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A908 3A C0 97     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A90B 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A90C CD E1 A8     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A90F 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A910 32 BF 97     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A913 C9           	ret
  43+ A914
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1033  A914                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A914              ;
   2+ A914              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ A914              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ A914              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ A914              ;               if a >= D
   6+ A914              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ A914              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ A914              ;           else
   9+ A914
  10+ A914              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ A914              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ A914              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ A914              ;
  14+ A914              ;
  15+ A914              ;
  16+ A914
  17+ A914              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  17+ A914 BA          >                        cp     d
  17+ A915 D2 33 A9    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  18+ A918 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  19+ A91A CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  20+ A91C 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  21+ A91E                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  21+ A91E BA          >                        cp      d
  21+ A91F DA 24 A9    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  22+ A922 92                                   sub     d
  23+ A923                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  23+ A923 B7          >                        or a
  24+ A924              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  24+ A924 3F          >                        ccf
  25+ A925 CB 13                                rl      e
  26+ A927 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  27+ A929 7B                                   ld      a,e
  28+ A92A C9                                   ret
  29+ A92B 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  30+ A92C                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  30+ A92C 37          >                        scf
  31+ A92D CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  32+ A92F 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  33+ A931 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  34+ A932 C9                                   ret
  35+ A933 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  36+ A935 C9                                   ret
  37+ A936
  38+ A936
  39+ A936              ; Divide 8-bit values
  40+ A936              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  41+ A936              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  42+ A936              ;
  43+ A936              ;;;Div8:
  44+ A936              ;;;    xor a
  45+ A936              ;;;    ld b,8
  46+ A936              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  47+ A936              ;;;    rl e
  48+ A936              ;;;    rla
  49+ A936              ;;;    sub c
  50+ A936              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  51+ A936              ;;;    add a,c
  52+ A936              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  53+ A936              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  54+ A936              ;;;    ld b,a0
  55+ A936              ;;;    ld a,e
  56+ A936              ;;;    rla
  57+ A936              ;;;    cpl
  58+ A936              ;;;    ret
  59+ A936
  60+ A936              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  61+ A936              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  62+ A936              ;;         A is a copy of E
  63+ A936              ;;         HL is the remainder
  64+ A936              ;;         BC is not changed
  65+ A936              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  66+ A936              ;140 bytes
  67+ A936              ;145cc
  68+ A936
  69+ A936              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  70+ A936 ~                                rla
  71+ A936 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  72+ A936 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  73+ A936 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  74+ A936 ~                                add     hl,bc
  75+ A936                                  ENDM
  76+ A936

  80+ A939 7A               ld a,d

 108+ A9C2
 109+ A9C2              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 110+ A9C2              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 111+ A9C2              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 112+ A9C2              ; Our use
 113+ A9C2              ; BC = A0
 114+ A9C2              ; DE = 0C
 115+ A9C2              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 116+ A9C2              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 116+ A9C2 B9          >                        cp     c
 116+ A9C3 D2 EE A9    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 117+ A9C6 47                                   ld      b,a
 118+ A9C7 59                                   ld      e,c
 119+ A9C8 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 120+ A9CA 16 00                                ld      d,0
 121+ A9CC C3 D9 A9                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 122+ A9CF 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 123+ A9D0 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 124+ A9D2 21 BF 97                             ld      hl,varQ
 125+ A9D5 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 126+ A9D6 16 00                                ld      d,0
 127+ A9D8 5F                                   ld      e,a
 128+ A9D9              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 129+ A9D9 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 130+ A9DC 78                                   ld      a,b
 131+ A9DD 06 10                                ld      b,16
 132+ A9DF CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 133+ A9E1 17                                   rla			; ...
 134+ A9E2 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 135+ A9E4 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 136+ A9E6 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 137+ A9E8 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 138+ A9E9 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 139+ A9EA 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 140+ A9EC 47                                   ld   b,a
 141+ A9ED C9                                   ret
 142+ A9EE 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 143+ A9F1 C9                                   ret
 144+ A9F2
 145+ A9F2              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 146+ A9F2 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 147+ A9F4 AF                                   xor a
 148+ A9F5 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 149+ A9F7 17                                   rla
 150+ A9F8 BA                                   cp d
 151+ A9F9 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 151+ A9FB
 152+ A9FB 0C                                   inc c
 153+ A9FC 92                                   sub d
 154+ A9FD 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 155+ A9FF C9                                   ret
 156+ AA00              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 157+ AA00 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 158+ AA02 AF                                   xor a
 159+ AA03 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 160+ AA05 CB 14                                rl	h
 161+ AA07              ;    add hl,hl
 162+ AA07 17                                   rla
 163+ AA08 B9                                   cp c
 164+ AA09 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 165+ AA0B 2C                                   inc l
 166+ AA0C 91                                   sub c
 167+ AA0D 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 168+ AA0F C9                                   ret
 169+ AA10              ;
 170+ AA10              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 171+ AA10              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 172+ AA10              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 173+ AA10              ;
 174+ AA10              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 175+ AA10 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 176+ AA10 ~            					rla				; ...
 177+ AA10 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 178+ AA10 ~            					jr	1F
 179+ AA10 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 180+ AA10 ~            1:
 181+ AA10 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 182+ AA10              					ENDM

 186+ AA10              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 187+ AA10 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 188+ AA13 78                               ld a,b
 189+ AA14 06 08                            ld b,8
 190+ AA16 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 191+ AA17 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 192+ AA19 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 193+ AA1B 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 194+ AA1D 19                               add hl,de
 195+ AA1E 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1

 201+ AA25 06 08                            ld b,8

 226+ AA36              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 227+ AA36              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 228+ AA36              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 229+ AA36              ;min: 738cc
 230+ AA36              ;max: 898cc
 231+ AA36              ;avg: 818cc
 232+ AA36              ;144 bytes
 233+ AA36 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 234+ AA37 67                                   ld h,a
 235+ AA38 6F                                   ld l,a
 236+ AA39 93                                   sub e
 237+ AA3A 5F                                   ld e,a
