  32+ B08F
  33+ B08F              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B08F              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B08F              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B08F 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B090 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B091 32 BF 97     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B094 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B095 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B097 CD B7 A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B09A              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B09A              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B09A              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B09A 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B09B E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B09D 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B09E 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B09F E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B0A1 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B0A3              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B0A3 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B0A5              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B0A5 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B0A7 DA B4 B0    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B0AA DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B0AC 37           		scf
  56+ B0AD CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B0AF 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B0B1              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B0B1 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B0B2 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B0B3 C9           		ret
  62+ B0B4              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B0B4 B7           	or			a
  64+ B0B5 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B0B7 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B0B9 C3 B1 B0     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B0BC
  68+ B0BC              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B0BC              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B0BC
  71+ B0BC
  72+ B0BC
  73+ B0BC
  74+ B0BC              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B0BC CD E7 B1     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B0BF 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B0C2 C3 F8 B0     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B0C5
  79+ B0C5              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B0C5 AF           		xor		a
  81+ B0C6 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B0C7 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B0CA E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B0CC CA BC B0     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B0CF 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B0D2 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B0D3 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B0D6 CD AD B1     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B0D9 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B0DC C3 F8 B0     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B0DF              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B0DF              TIDY:
  93+ B0DF DD 01                break
  94+ B0E1              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B0E1              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B0E1 CD 1D B0     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B0E4 CD C4 AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B0E7 CD 56 B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B0EA              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B0EA 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B0ED E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B0EF CA C5 B0     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B0F2              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B0F2 CD 73 B1             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B0F5 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B0F8              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B0F8 CD 30 B0     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B0FB CD C4 AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B0FE              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B0FE CD 69 B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B101 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B104 32 BF 97     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B107 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B10A CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B10D 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B110 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B111 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B114 CD 8F B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B117                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B117 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B118 CA 1D B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B11B EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B11D              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B11D 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B120              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B120 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B123 32 BF 97     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B126 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B129 CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B12C 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B12F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B130 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B133 CD 8F B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B136                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B136 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B137 CA 3C B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B13A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B13C              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B13C 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B13F              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B13F 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B142 32 BF 97     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B145 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B148 CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B14B 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B14E 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B14F 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B152 CD 8F B0     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B155                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B155 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B156 CA 5B B1    >                        jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B159 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B15B              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B15B 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B15E              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B15E 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B161 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B163 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B164              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B164 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B165 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B166 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B167 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B169 CD 43 B0     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B16C CD C4 AB     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B16F              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B16F CD 7C B0     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B172
 163+ B172 C9           		ret
 164+ B173
 165+ B173
 166+ B173
 167+ B173              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B173              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B173              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B173              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B173              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B173              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B173              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B173              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B173              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B173              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B173              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B173
 239+ B173
 240+ B173              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B173              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B173              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B173 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B176 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B179 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B17C CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B17F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B17F 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B182 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B185 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B188 CD B7 A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B18B 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B18C E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B18E FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B190              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B190 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B193 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B194 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B196 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B198 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B19A 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B19B E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B19D 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B19E 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B19F 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B1A0 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B1A2 CD 36 AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B1A5 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B1A7 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B1A9 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B1AB B0           		or		b
 268+ B1AC C9           		ret
 269+ B1AD
 270+ B1AD
 271+ B1AD              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B1AD              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B1AD              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B1AD 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B1B0 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B1B3 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B1B6 CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B1B9              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B1B9 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B1BC 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B1BF 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B1C2 CD B7 A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B1C5 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B1C6 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B1C8 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B1CA 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B1CD 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B1CE E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B1D0 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B1D2 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B1D4 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B1D5 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B1D7 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B1D8 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B1D9 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B1DA 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B1DC CD 36 AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B1DF FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B1E1 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B1E3 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B1E5 B0           		or		b
 298+ B1E6 C9           		ret
 299+ B1E7
 300+ B1E7              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B1E7              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B1E7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B1E7 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B1EA 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B1ED 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B1F0 CD 0F B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B1F3              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B1F3 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B1F6 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B1F9 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B1FC CD B7 A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B1FF 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B200 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B202 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B204 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B207 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B208 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B20A FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B20C FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B20E 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B20F E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B211 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B212 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B213 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B214 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B216 CD 36 AA     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B219 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B21B EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B21D E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B21F B0           		or		b
 327+ B220 C9           		ret
 328+ B221
 329+ B221
 330+ B221
 331+ B221              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B221              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B221              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B221              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B221              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B221              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B221              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B221              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B221              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B221              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B221              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B221              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B221              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B221              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B221              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B221              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B221              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B221              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B221              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B221              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B221              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B221              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B221              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B221              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B221              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B221              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B221
 377+ B221
 378+ B221
 379+ B221
 380+ B221
 381+ B221
 382+ B221              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B221              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B221              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ B221              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ B221
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1062  B221                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B221
   2+ B221              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B221 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B222 D2 40 B2    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B225 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B227 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B229 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B22B                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B22B BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B22C DA 31 B2    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B22F 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B230                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B230 B7          >                        or a
   9+ B231 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B232 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B234 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B236 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B237 C9                                   ret
  14+ B238 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B239 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B23A CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B23C 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B23E 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B23F C9                                   ret
  20+ B240 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B242 C9                                   ret
  22+ B243
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1063  B243                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B243              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B243              TIS1:
   3+ B243 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B244 3A 9B 96     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B247 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B248 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B249              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B249 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B24A 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B24B 32 BF 97     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B24E 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B24F EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B251 CD B7 A7     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B254              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B254              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B254              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B254 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B255 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B257 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B258 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B259 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B25B 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B25D 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B25E              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B25E CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B260 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B262 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B264 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B266              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B266 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B268 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B26A 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B26B B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B26C C9           		ret
  35+ B26D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
1064  B26D              ;INCLUDE "XAequQmuilAaddRS-MAD-ADD.asm"

1072  B26D                  INCLUDE "./Drive/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Drive/drive_access.asm
   1+ B26D              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ B26D              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ B26D              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ B26D              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ B26D              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ B26D              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ B26D
   8+ B26D              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ B26D              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ B26D              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ B26D
  12+ B26D F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ B271 DD E5
  13+ B273 AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ B274 CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ B275 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ B276 32 80 B2                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ B279 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ B27D C1 F1
  18+ B27F C9                                   ret
  19+ B280 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ B281
  21+ B281              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ B281              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ B281              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ B281              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ B281              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ B281              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ B281 E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ B284 DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ B286 3A 80 B2                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ B289 CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ B28A 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ B28B DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ B28E C9                                   ret
  34+ B28F
  35+ B28F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ B28F              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ B28F              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ B28F              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ B28F              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ B28F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ B28F B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ B290 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ B291 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ B294 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ B295 CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ B296 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ B297 E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ B298 C9                                   ret
  49+ B299
  50+ B299              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ B299              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ B299              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ B299              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ B299              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ B299              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ B299 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ B29A C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ B29B E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ B29E E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ B29F CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ B2A0 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ B2A1 E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ B2A2 C9                                   ret
  64+ B2A3
  65+ B2A3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ B2A3              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ B2A3              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ B2A3              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ B2A3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ B2A3 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ B2A4 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ B2A5 CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ B2A6 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ B2A7 C9                                   ret
  75+ B2A8
  76+ B2A8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ B2A8              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ B2A8              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ B2A8              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ B2A8              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ B2A8              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ B2A8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ B2A8 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ B2AB CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ B2AC 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ B2AD E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ B2B0 C9                                   ret
  88+ B2B1
  89+ B2B1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ B2B1              ; Init the file system
  91+ B2B1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ B2B1 CD 6D B2     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ B2B4 C9                                   ret
  94+ B2B5
  95+ B2B5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ B2B5              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ B2B5              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ B2B5              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ B2B5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ B2B5 CD 6D B2     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ B2B8 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ B2BB                                      ; get file size
 103+ B2BB 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ B2BC 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ B2BD 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ B2BE 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ B2BF C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ B2C2 E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ B2C3 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ B2C5 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ B2C7 CD 81 B2                             call    fOpen
 112+ B2CA 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ B2CC FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ B2CE 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ B2D0 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ B2D3 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ B2D4 CD 8F B2                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ B2D7 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ B2D9 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ B2DA CD A3 B2                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ B2DD 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ B2DF F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ B2E2 C9                                   ret
 124+ B2E3              ;
 125+ B2E3              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ B2E3              ;
 127+ B2E3 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ B2E5 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ B2E6
 130+ B2E6              .error_closing:
 131+ B2E6 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ B2E7 D1                                   pop	de
 133+ B2E8 C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ B2E9 C9                                   ret
 135+ B2EA
 136+ B2EA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ B2EA              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ B2EA              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ B2EA              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ B2EA              ;		bc = size
 141+ B2EA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ B2EA CD 6D B2     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ B2ED C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ B2EF E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ B2F0 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ B2F2 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ B2F4 CD 81 B2                             call    fOpen
 148+ B2F7 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ B2F9 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ B2FB 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ B2FD DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ B2FF C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ B300 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ B301 CD 99 B2                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ B304 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ B306 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ B307 CD A3 B2                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ B30A C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ B30B              ;
 160+ B30B              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ B30B              ;
 162+ B30B DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ B30D C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ B30E C9                                   ret
 165+ B30F
# file closed: ./Drive/drive_access.asm

  18+ B3BC
  19+ B3BC              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ B3BC              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ B3BC              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ B3BC C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ B3BD 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ B3BE 23           	inc			hl
  25+ B3BF 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ B3C0 23           	inc			hl
  27+ B3C1 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ B3C2 23           	inc			hl
  29+ B3C3 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B3C4 23           	inc			hl
  31+ B3C5 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B3C6 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ B3C7 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ B3C9                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ B3C9 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ B3CD CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ B3D0 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ B3D1 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ B3D2 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B3D4 C9           	ret
  40+ B3D5
  41+ B3D5
  42+ B3D5              print_boiler_text:
  43+ B3D5              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B3D5              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B3D5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ B3D6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ B3D7 23           	inc			hl
  48+ B3D8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ B3D9 23           	inc			hl
  50+ B3DA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ B3DB 23           	inc			hl
  52+ B3DC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B3DD 23           	inc			hl
  54+ B3DE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B3DF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ B3E0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ B3E2 C5           	push		bc
  58+ B3E3 D1           	pop			de
  59+ B3E4 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ B3E7 E1           	pop			hl

  63+ B3EB C9           	ret

  24++B40F 13           	inc		de
  25++B410 F1           	pop		af
  26++B411 C1           	pop		bc
  27++B412 C9           	ret

  31++B416 13           	inc		de
  32++B417 C9           	ret

  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:

  72+ C134 ED 5B D4 98                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD CD E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret
 105+ C173
 106+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 107+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 108+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 109+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 110+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 111+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 112+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 112+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 113+ C182 CD 60 E2                             call	l2_draw_horz_line

 119+ C18A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.ClearLoop

 121+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ C18D 3A C1 98     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)
 123+ C190                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 141+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 142+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance

 144+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 145+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2

 146+ C1C9 CD CF E1                             call	l2_print_7at

 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A C1 98     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B D4 98                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B D6 98                          ld      bc,(TargetPlanetX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD E8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A B6 98                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 56 AD                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 7A AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 7A AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 7A AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD AF 9C     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A C1 98                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc

 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b

 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a

 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc

 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc

 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc

 459+ C479 3A D7 98     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 460+ C47C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,src_BoundsLimit
 460+ C47C FE 01       >                        cp     1
 460+ C47E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 461+ C481 3D                                   dec     a
 462+ C482 32 D7 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 463+ C485 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 464+ C488 C9                                   ret
 465+ C489              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 466+ C489 3A D7 98     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetY)
 467+ C48C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 467+ C48C FE FF       >                        cp     255
 467+ C48E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 468+ C491 3C                                   inc    a
 469+ C492 32 D7 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetY),a
 470+ C495 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 471+ C498 C9                                   ret
 472+ C499              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 473+ C499 3A D6 98     src_LeftPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 474+ C49C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,src_BoundsLimit
 474+ C49C FE 02       >                        cp     2
 474+ C49E CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C4A1 3D                                   dec    a
 476+ C4A2 32 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 477+ C4A5 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 478+ C4A8 C9                                   ret
 479+ C4A9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 480+ C4A9 3A D6 98     src_RightPressed:       ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 481+ C4AC                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,src_BoundsLimit
 481+ C4AC FE FD       >                        cp     253
 481+ C4AE CA DA C4    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4B1 3C                                   inc    a
 483+ C4B2 32 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 484+ C4B5 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 485+ C4B8 C9                                   ret
 486+ C4B9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 487+ C4B9 2A D4 98     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 488+ C4BC 22 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),hl
 489+ C4BF CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 490+ C4C2 C9                                   ret
 491+ C4C3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 492+ C4C3 DD 01        src_RecenterPressed:    break
 493+ C4C5 3A C1 98                             ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 494+ C4C8                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 494+ C4C8 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 495+ C4CB ED 4B D6 98                          ld      bc,(TargetPlanetX)
 496+ C4CF CD 60 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 497+ C4D2 ED 43 D6 98                          ld      (TargetPlanetX),bc
 498+ C4D6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 499+ C4D9 C9                                   ret
 500+ C4DA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 501+ C4DA AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 502+ C4DB C9                                   ret

  24+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  25+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  26+ C0A9              GCM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:

  28+ C0AD              .OnGalacticChart:
  29+ C0AD CB 38        	srl		b								; but row is row / 2
  30+ C0AF C5           	push  	bc
  31+ C0B0              	MMUSelectSpriteBank
  31+ C0B0 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

  38+ C0BF CB 3F        	srl		a

  40+ C0C3 57           	ld		d,a
  41+ C0C4 1E FF        	ld		e,$FF
  42+ C0C6              	MMUSelectLayer2
  42+ C0C6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2

  56+ C0DC              plot_gc_stars:
  57+ C0DC AF           	xor		a
  58+ C0DD 32 C4 97     	ld		(XSAV),a
  59+ C0E0 DD 21 16 E0      ld      ix,galaxy_data
  60+ C0E4              .CounterLoop:
  61+ C0E4 3A C1 98         ld      a,(Galaxy)
  62+ C0E7                  MMUSelectGalaxyA
  62+ C0E7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  63+ C0EA DD E5            push    ix
  64+ C0EC E1               pop     hl
  65+ C0ED 11 AB 97         ld      de,SystemSeed
  66+ C0F0 CD 82 9C     	call    copy_seed
  67+ C0F3 3A AE 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed w1_h is Xcoord of star
  68+ C0F6 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = X Coord
  69+ C0F7 3A AC 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  70+ C0FA CB 3F        	srl		a								; Ycoord /2
  71+ C0FC C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset		; add offset to Y coord of star
  72+ C0FE 47           	ld		b,a								; b = row
  73+ C0FF C5           	push	bc
  74+ C100 3E D8        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour
  75+ C102                  MMUSelectLayer2
  75+ C102 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  76+ C106 CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  77+ C109 C1           	pop		bc
  78+ C10A 3A AF 97     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  79+ C10D F6 50        	or		$50								; minimum distance away
  80+ C10F FE 90        	cp		$90
  81+ C111 30 0A        	jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel
  82+ C113              .SecondPixel:
  83+ C113 0C           	inc		c
  84+ C114 3E 6C        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  85+ C116                  MMUSelectLayer2
  85+ C116 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  86+ C11A CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  87+ C11D              .NoSecondPixel:
  88+ C11D DD E5            push    ix
  89+ C11F E1               pop     hl
  90+ C120 ED 34 08 00      add     hl,8
  91+ C124 E5               push    hl
  92+ C125 DD E1            pop     ix
  93+ C127 3A C4 97     	ld		a,(XSAV)
  94+ C12A 3D           	dec		a
  95+ C12B FE 00        	cp		0
  96+ C12D C8           	ret		z
  97+ C12E 32 C4 97     	ld		(XSAV),a
  98+ C131 18 B1        	jr		.CounterLoop

 155+ C20A              gc_display_find_text:

 161+ C218              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 162+ C218              gc_display_find_string:
 163+ C218 11 BC C1         ld      de,gcInputText
 164+ C21B CD 67 95         call    keyboard_copy_input_to_de
 165+ C21E 21 BA C1         ld      hl,gcCursorChar         ; Now just copy cursor char too
 166+ C221 ED A0            ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 167+ C223 3A 64 95         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 168+ C226 3C               inc     a
 169+ C227 47               ld      b,a
 170+ C228 3E 14            ld      a,20
 171+ C22A 90               sub     b
 172+ C22B 47               ld      b,a
 173+ C22C 3E 20            ld      a," "
 174+ C22E              .SpacePad
 175+ C22E 12               ld      (de),a
 176+ C22F 13               inc     de
 177+ C230 10 FC            djnz    .SpacePad
 178+ C232 AF               xor     a
 179+ C233 12               ld      (de),a
 180+ C234 11 38 B0     	ld		de,galactic_find_text    ; Display text
 181+ C237 21 BC C1         ld      hl,gcInputText
 182+ C23A                  MMUSelectLayer1
 182+ C23A ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 183+ C23E CD C8 E0     	call	l1_print_at
 184+ C241 C9               ret

 186+ C242              blink_cursor:
 187+ C242 3A B9 C1         ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 188+ C245 3D               dec     a
 189+ C246 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 190+ C249 C0               ret     nz
 191+ C24A              .FlashCursor:
 192+ C24A 3E 10            ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 193+ C24C 32 B9 C1         ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 194+ C24F 3A BA C1         ld      a,(gcCursorChar)
 195+ C252 FE 20            cp      " "
 196+ C254 28 06            jr      z,.ChangeToStar
 197+ C256 3E 20            ld      a," "
 198+ C258 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 199+ C25B C9               ret
 200+ C25C              .ChangeToStar:

 202+ C25E 32 BA C1         ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 203+ C261 C9               ret
 204+ C262              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 205+ C262 3A B8 C1     loop_gc_menu:           ld      a,(gcFindInputMode)
 206+ C265 FE 00                                cp      0
 207+ C267 20 1C                                jr      nz,AlreadyInInputMode
 208+ C269 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 209+ C26B CD F7 94                             call    is_key_pressed
 210+ C26E C0                                   ret     nz
 211+ C26F CD 7A 95                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 212+ C272 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 213+ C274 32 B8 C1                             ld      (gcFindInputMode),a                     ; Set input mode to FF
 214+ C277 3E 10                                ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 215+ C279 32 B9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a                       ; Set up Blink
 216+ C27C 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 217+ C27E 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a                         ; And keyboard rescan delay
 218+ C281 CD 0A C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text
 219+ C284 C9                                   ret
 220+ C285              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 221+ C285 3A DB C1     AlreadyInInputMode:     ld      a,(gcInputDelay)                    ; keyboard next press delay
 222+ C288 FE 00                                cp      0                                   ; can no read until its zero
 223+ C28A 20 17                                jr      nz,.blinkCursor                     ; so re just go to blink cursor routine if not permitted
 224+ C28C CD 8E 95     .HasKeyBeenPressed:     call    InputName                           ; else we are ready to read input
 225+ C28F 3A 66 95                             ld      a,(InputChanged)
 226+ C292 47                                   ld      b,a
 227+ C293 FE 00                                cp      0
 228+ C295 28 13                                jr      z,.blinkNoDelay                     ; when we go hear the input delay could be zero a flip over
 229+ C297 3E 0A                                ld      a,gcDelayVal
 230+ C299 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a
 231+ C29C 3A 65 95     .WasItEnter:            ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 232+ C29F FE 00                                cp      0
 233+ C2A1 20 1A                                jr      nz,.FindEnterPressed
 234+ C2A3 3A DB C1     .blinkCursor:           ld      a,(gcInputDelay)
 235+ C2A6 3D                                   dec     a
 236+ C2A7 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a
 237+ C2AA CD 42 C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 238+ C2AD 3A B9 C1                             ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 239+ C2B0 FE 10                                cp      gcBlinkVal
 240+ C2B2 CC 18 C2                             call    z,gc_display_find_string
 241+ C2B5 C9                                   ret
 242+ C2B6 78           .FindDone:              ld      a,b
 243+ C2B7 FE 00                                cp      0
 244+ C2B9 C4 18 C2                             call    nz,gc_display_find_string
 245+ C2BC C9                                   ret
 246+ C2BD AF           .FindEnterPressed:      xor     a
 247+ C2BE 32 65 95                             ld      (EnterPressed),a                    ; reset enter
 248+ C2C1 32 B8 C1                             ld      (gcFindInputMode),a
 249+ C2C4 3A C1 98                             ld      a,(Galaxy)                          ; Fetch correct galaxy seed bank into memory
 250+ C2C7                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 250+ C2C7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 251+ C2CA 21 45 95                             ld      hl,InputString
 252+ C2CD 11 5D E8                             ld      de,GalaxySearchString
 253+ C2D0 CD CF F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 254+ C2D3 CD 2C FB                             call    find_system_by_name
 255+ C2D6 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                 ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 256+ C2D8 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 257+ C2DA 3A FA E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 258+ C2DD 4F                                   ld      c,a
 259+ C2DE 3A F8 E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 260+ C2E1 47                                   ld      b,a
 261+ C2E2 ED 43 D6 98                          ld      (TargetPlanetX),bc
 262+ C2E6 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 263+ C2E9 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 264+ C2EC 21 73 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_match
 265+ C2EF                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 265+ C2EF ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 266+ C2F3 CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 267+ C2F6 C9                                   ret
 268+ C2F7              .FindNoMatch:           ; if not found display "Not found"
 269+ C2F7                                      ; move curor if found
 270+ C2F7 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 271+ C2FA 21 58 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_no_match
 272+ C2FD                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 272+ C2FD ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 273+ C301 CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 274+ C304 C9                                   ret; DOSTUFFHERE

 278+ C30A C0                                   ret     nz
 279+ C30B 3A C9 97                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 280+ C30E FE 00                                cp      0
 281+ C310 C8                                   ret     z
 282+ C311 17                                   rla
 283+ C312 DC 2A C3                             call   c,gc_UpPressed
 284+ C315 17                                   rla
 285+ C316 DC 3A C3                             call   c,gc_DownPressed
 286+ C319 17                                   rla
 287+ C31A DC 4A C3                             call   c,gc_LeftPressed
 288+ C31D 17                                   rla
 289+ C31E DC 5A C3                             call   c,gc_RightPressed
 290+ C321 17                                   rla
 291+ C322 DC 6A C3                             call   c,gc_HomePressed
 292+ C325 17                                   rla
 293+ C326 DC 74 C3                             call   c,gc_RecenterPressed
 294+ C329 C9                                   ret
 295+ C32A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 296+ C32A 3A D7 98     gc_UpPressed:           ld     a,(TargetPlanetX+1)
 297+ C32D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,gc_BoundsLimit
 297+ C32D FE 01       >                        cp     1
 297+ C32F CA 89 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 298+ C332 3D                                   dec     a
 299+ C333 32 D7 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX+1),a
 300+ C336 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 301+ C339 C9                                   ret
 302+ C33A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 303+ C33A 3A D7 98     gc_DownPressed:         ld     a,(TargetPlanetX+1)
 304+ C33D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,gc_BoundsLimit
 304+ C33D FE FF       >                        cp     255
 304+ C33F CA 89 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 305+ C342 3C                                   inc    a
 306+ C343 32 D7 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX+1),a
 307+ C346 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 308+ C349 C9                                   ret
 309+ C34A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 310+ C34A 3A D6 98     gc_LeftPressed:         ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 311+ C34D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,gc_BoundsLimit
 311+ C34D FE 02       >                        cp     2
 311+ C34F CA 89 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 312+ C352 3D                                   dec    a
 313+ C353 32 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 314+ C356 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 315+ C359 C9                                   ret
 316+ C35A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 317+ C35A 3A D6 98     gc_RightPressed:        ld     a,(TargetPlanetX)
 318+ C35D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,gc_BoundsLimit
 318+ C35D FE FD       >                        cp     253
 318+ C35F CA 89 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 319+ C362 3C                                   inc    a
 320+ C363 32 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),a
 321+ C366 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 322+ C369 C9                                   ret
 323+ C36A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 324+ C36A 2A D4 98     gc_HomePressed:         ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 325+ C36D 22 D6 98                             ld      (TargetPlanetX),hl
 326+ C370 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 327+ C373 C9                                   ret
 328+ C374              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 329+ C374 3A C1 98     gc_RecenterPressed:     ld      a,(Galaxy)       ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 330+ C377                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 330+ C377 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 331+ C37A ED 4B D6 98                          ld      bc,(TargetPlanetX)
 332+ C37E CD 60 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 333+ C381 ED 43 D6 98                          ld      (TargetPlanetX),bc
 334+ C385 CD 8B C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 335+ C388 C9                                   ret
 336+ C389              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 337+ C389 AF           gc_BoundsLimit          xor     a
 338+ C38A C9                                   ret
 339+ C38B
 340+ C38B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 341+ C38B ED 4B D6 98  UpdateGalacticCursor:   ld		bc,(TargetPlanetX)              ; bc = selected jump

 343+ C391                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
 343+ C391 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

 350+ C3A9 FE 00                                cp      0
 351+ C3AB C8                                   ret     z

 364+ C3CD 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 365+ C3D0 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 366+ C3D2                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 366+ C3D2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2

 368+ C3D9 C9                                   ret

 371+ C3DC 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 372+ C3DF 01 0A A0                             ld      bc,$A00A
 373+ C3E2 E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 374+ C3E3 D5                                   push    de

 376+ C3E5                                      MMUSelectLayer2

 379+ C3ED D1                                   pop     de

 384+ C3F3 C9                                   ret
 385+ C3F4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 386+ C3F4 3A C1 98     gc_calc_distance:       ld      a,(Galaxy)
 387+ C3F7                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 387+ C3F7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 388+ C3FA 11 1E C0                             ld      de,galactic_chart_dist_amount

 390+ C400 ED A0                                ldi
 391+ C402 ED A0                                ldi
 392+ C404 ED A0                                ldi
 393+ C406 ED A0                                ldi
 394+ C408 ED A0                                ldi
 395+ C40A ED 4B D4 98                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 396+ C40E ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc

 398+ C416 ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 399+ C41A CD E8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance            ; get distance into HL
 400+ C41D DD 2A B6 98                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 401+ C421 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 402+ C424 FD 21 36 C0                          ld      iy,galactic_distance
 403+ C428 CD 56 AD                             call    DispDEIXtoIY
 404+ C42B FD E5                                push    iy
 405+ C42D E1                                   pop     hl
 406+ C42E 11 36 C0                             ld      de,galactic_distance
 407+ C431 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				;Push last digit to post decimal
 408+ C432 32 22 C0                             ld		(galactic_chart_fraction),a
 409+ C435 2B                                   dec     hl

 411+ C439 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number

 414+ C43F 2B                                   dec     hl

 419+ C449 2B                                   dec     hl

 421+ C44D 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 422+ C44F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 423+ C450 32 1E C0                             ld      (galactic_chart_dist_amount),a
 424+ C453 C9           .done_number:           ret

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
