  68+ C107
  69+ C107              LaunchTubeEdges         MMUSelectLayer2
  69+ C107 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  70+ C10B 01 00 00                             ld      bc,$0000
  71+ C10E 11 92 01                             ld      de,$0192
  72+ C111 78           .drawLoop1              ld      a,b
  73+ C112 FE 80                                cp      128
  74+ C114 28 25                                jr      z,.DoneEdge
  75+ C116 F5                                   push    af
  76+ C117 C5 D5 C5 D5                          push    bc,,de,,bc,,de
  77+ C11B CD 53 E2                             call    l2_draw_horz_dma_bank           ;"bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  78+ C11E D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  79+ C120 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  80+ C122 92                                   sub     d
  81+ C123 4F                                   ld      c,a
  82+ C124 0C                                   inc     c
  83+ C125 CD 53 E2                             call    l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
  84+ C128 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  85+ C12A 78                                   ld      a,b
  86+ C12B FE 40                                cp      64
  87+ C12D 30 06                                jr      nc,.ReduceLoop
  88+ C12F 14                                   inc     d
  89+ C130 14                                   inc     d
  90+ C131 F1                                   pop     af
  91+ C132 04                                   inc     b
  92+ C133 18 DC                                jr      .drawLoop1
  93+ C135 15           .ReduceLoop:            dec     d
  94+ C136 15                                   dec     d
  95+ C137 F1                                   pop     af
  96+ C138 04                                   inc     b
  97+ C139 18 D6                                jr      .drawLoop1
  98+ C13B 3E 80        .DoneEdge:              ld      a,$80
  99+ C13D 01 00 00                             ld      bc,$0000                        ; Top Left
 100+ C140 11 FF 80                             ld      de,$80FF                        ; Bottom Right
 101+ C143 CD 09 E6                             call    l2_draw_diagonal
 102+ C146 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 103+ C148 01 00 80                             ld      bc,$8000                        ; Botom Left
 104+ C14B 11 FF 00                             ld      de,$00FF                        ; Top Right
 105+ C14E CD 09 E6                             call    l2_draw_diagonal
 106+ C151
 107+ C151 01 00 00                             ld      bc,$0000
 108+ C154 11 80 00                             ld      DE,$0080
 109+ C157 26 60                                ld      h,$60
 110+ C159 2E 55                                ld      l,$55
 111+ C15B C9                                   ret
 112+ C15C
 113+ C15C              LaunchConsole:          MMUSelectConsoleBank                    ; Draw Console
 113+ C15C ED 91 57 3D >					 nextreg ConsoleImageDataMMU,  BankConsole
 114+ C160 21 00 50                             ld      hl,ScreenL1Bottom
 115+ C163 11 00 E0                             ld      de,ConsoleImageData
 116+ C166 01 00 08                             ld      bc, ScreenL1BottomLen
 117+ C169 CD 97 93                             call    memcopy_dma
 118+ C16C 21 00 5A                             ld      hl,ScreenL1AttrBtm       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
 119+ C16F 11 00 E8                             ld      de,ConsoleAttributes
 120+ C172 01 00 01                             ld      bc, ScreenL1AttrBtmLen
 121+ C175 CD 97 93                             call    memcopy_dma
 122+ C178 C9                                   ret
 123+ C179
 124+ C179              CoriloisStation         equ     13

 127+ C179              draw_launch_ship:       MMUSelectLayer1
 127+ C179 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 128+ C17D CD 80 E0                             call    l1_cls
 129+ C180 CD 9A E0                             call    l1_attr_cls
 130+ C183                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
 130+ C183 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 131+ C187 CD 34 E4                             call    sprite_cls_cursors
 132+ C18A                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 132+ C18A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 133+ C18E CD 02 E0                             call    asm_l2_double_buffer_on
 134+ C191 3E FF        .CurrentBuffer:         ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 135+ C193 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 136+ C196 CD 92 E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 137+ C199 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 138+ C19B 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 139+ C19E CD BE E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 140+ C1A1 CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 141+ C1A4 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 142+ C1A7              .NextBuffer:            MMUSelectLayer2
 142+ C1A7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 143+ C1AB CD DD E0                             call    l2_flip_buffers
 144+ C1AE 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 145+ C1B0 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 146+ C1B3 CD 92 E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 147+ C1B6 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 148+ C1B8 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 149+ C1BB CD BE E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 150+ C1BE CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 151+ C1C1 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 152+ C1C4 3E FF        .SetUpTimers:           ld      a,init_countdown
 153+ C1C6 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 154+ C1C9 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,launchdraw_table
 155+ C1CC 22 01 C1                             ld      (launch_table_idx),hl
 156+ C1CF AF                                   xor     a
 157+ C1D0 32 05 C1                             ld      (current_offsetX),a
 158+ C1D3 32 06 C1                             ld      (current_offsetY),a
 159+ C1D6              .SetupGalaxy:           MaxThrottle
 159+ C1D6 3A BA 97    >                        ld      a,(SHIPMAXSPEED)
 159+ C1D9 32 BB 97    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 159+ C1DC 57          >                        ld      d,a
 159+ C1DD 1E 04       >                        ld      e,4
 159+ C1DF ED 30       >                        mul
 159+ C1E1 ED 53 BC 97 >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),de
 160+ C1E5                                      ZeroThrottle; DEBUG
 160+ C1E5 AF          >                        xor     a
 160+ C1E6 32 BB 97    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 160+ C1E9 32 BC 97    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),a
 160+ C1EC 32 BD 97    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo+1),a
 161+ C1EF              ; To launch we need to set docked flag to transition FE and at teh end of the transition set to FD to rebuild universe
 162+ C1EF 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE
 163+ C1F1 32 CF 97                             ld      (DockedFlag),a
 164+ C1F4 C9                                   ret
 165+ C1F5
 166+ C1F5
 167+ C1F5              draw_docking_ship:      MMUSelectLayer1
 167+ C1F5 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 168+ C1F9 CD 80 E0                             call    l1_cls
 169+ C1FC CD 9A E0                             call    l1_attr_cls
 170+ C1FF                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
 170+ C1FF ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 171+ C203 CD 34 E4                             call    sprite_cls_cursors
 172+ C206                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 172+ C206 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 173+ C20A CD 02 E0                             call    asm_l2_double_buffer_on
 174+ C20D 3E FF        .CurrentBuffer:         ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 175+ C20F 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 176+ C212 CD 92 E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 177+ C215 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 178+ C217 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 179+ C21A CD BE E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 180+ C21D CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 181+ C220 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 182+ C223              .NextBuffer:            MMUSelectLayer2
 182+ C223 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 183+ C227 CD DD E0                             call    l2_flip_buffers
 184+ C22A 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 185+ C22C 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 186+ C22F CD 92 E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 187+ C232 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 188+ C234 32 72 E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 189+ C237 CD BE E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 190+ C23A CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 191+ C23D CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 192+ C240 3E FF        .SetUpTimers:           ld      a,init_countdown
 193+ C242 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 194+ C245 21 87 C0                             ld      hl,dockingdraw_table
 195+ C248 22 03 C1                             ld      (docking_table_idx),hl
 196+ C24B AF                                   xor     a
 197+ C24C 32 05 C1                             ld      (current_offsetX),a
 198+ C24F 32 06 C1                             ld      (current_offsetY),a
 199+ C252 AF           .SetupGalaxy:           xor     a ; palcehodler as it would cause next macro to fail re initialise all universe banks
 200+ C253                                      ZeroThrottle
 200+ C253 AF          >                        xor     a
 200+ C254 32 BB 97    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 200+ C257 32 BC 97    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),a
 200+ C25A 32 BD 97    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo+1),a
 201+ C25D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 202+ C25F 32 CF 97                             ld      (DockedFlag),a ; we don't kill off shipts as we kill them on launch
 203+ C262 C9                                   ret
 204+ C263
 205+ C263 CD 07 C1     loop_launch_ship:       call    LaunchTubeEdges
 206+ C266 3E FF                                ld      a,init_countdown
 207+ C268 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 208+ C26B 2A 01 C1                             ld      hl,(launch_table_idx)
 209+ C26E 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)
 210+ C26F 79                                   ld      a,c
 211+ C270 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 212+ C272 28 1E                                jr      z,.FinishedLaunch
 213+ C274 23                                   inc     hl
 214+ C275 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                 ; bc = top left
 215+ C276 23                                   inc     hl
 216+ C277 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 217+ C278 23                                   inc     hl
 218+ C279 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                 ;de = width and height
 219+ C27A 23                                   inc     hl
 220+ C27B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                 ; a = colour
 221+ C27C 23                                   inc     hl
 222+ C27D 22 01 C1                             ld      (launch_table_idx),hl
 223+ C280 67                                   ld      h,a
 224+ C281 C5 D5                                push    bc,,de
 225+ C283                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 225+ C283 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 226+ C287 CD E6 E1                             call    l2_draw_fill_box        ; ; "l2_draw_fill_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth h=color"
 227+ C28A D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 228+ C28C 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 229+ C28E CD F6 E1                             call    l2_draw_box             ; "l2_draw_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth a=color"
 230+ C291 C9                                   ret
 231+ C292 3E FD        .FinishedLaunch:        ld      a,$FD                   ; now seed that we need a universe rebuild post launch
 232+ C294 32 CF 97                             ld      (DockedFlag),a
 233+ C297 C9                                   ret
 234+ C298
 235+ C298 CD 07 C1     loop_docking_ship:      call    LaunchTubeEdges
 236+ C29B 3E FF                                ld      a,init_countdown
 237+ C29D 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 238+ C2A0 2A 03 C1                             ld      hl,(docking_table_idx)
 239+ C2A3 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)
 240+ C2A4 79                                   ld      a,c
 241+ C2A5 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 242+ C2A7 28 1E                                jr      z,.FinishedDocking
 243+ C2A9 23                                   inc     hl
 244+ C2AA 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                 ; bc = top left
 245+ C2AB 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2AC 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 247+ C2AD 23                                   inc     hl
 248+ C2AE 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                 ;de = width and height
 249+ C2AF 23                                   inc     hl
 250+ C2B0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 251+ C2B1 23                                   inc     hl
 252+ C2B2 22 03 C1                             ld      (docking_table_idx),hl
 253+ C2B5 67                                   ld      h,a
 254+ C2B6 C5 D5                                push    bc,,de
 255+ C2B8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 255+ C2B8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 256+ C2BC CD E6 E1                             call    l2_draw_fill_box
 257+ C2BF D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 258+ C2C1 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 259+ C2C3 CD F6 E1                             call    l2_draw_box
 260+ C2C6 C9                                   ret
 261+ C2C7              .FinishedDocking        ForceTransition ScreenStatus              ; Force move to status screen
 261+ C2C7 3E 04       >                        ld      a,ScreenStatus
 261+ C2C9 32 B8 86    >                        ld      (ScreenTransitionForced), a
 262+ C2CC C9                                   ret

1267  C2CD              ; Bank 70  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1268  C2CD                  SLOT    UniverseBankAddr
1269  C2CD                  PAGE    BankUNIVDATA0
1270  C2CD              	ORG	    UniverseBankAddr,BankUNIVDATA0
1271  C000                  INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   4+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   5+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   6+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
   9+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  10+ C000
  11+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  12+ C000 55 6E 69 76  StartOfUniv:        DB "Universe PG"
  12+ C004 65 72 73 65
  12+ C008 20 50 47
  13+ C00B 58           StartOfUnivN:       DB "X"
  14+ C00C              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  15+ C00C
  16+ C00C              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  17+ C00C              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  18+ C00C              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  19+ C00C                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ShipPosVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ShipPosVars.asm
   1++C00C              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C00C 00           UBnKxlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+0
   3++C00D 00           UBnKxhi                     DB  0                       ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
   4++C00E 00           UBnKxsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK+2
   5++C00F 00           UBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo
   6++C010 00           UBnKyhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK+4 \ yHi
   7++C011 00           UBnKysgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +5
   8++C012 00           UBnKzlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK +6
   9++C013 00           UBnKzhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK +7
  10++C014 00           UBnKzsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +8
  11++C015
  12++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKxlo                     equ UBnKxlo
  13++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKxhi                     equ UBnKxhi                 ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
  14++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKxsgn                    equ UBnKzsgn                ; INWK+2
  15++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKyLo                     equ UBnKylo                 ; INWK+3 \ ylo
  16++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKyhi                     equ UbnKyhi                 ; Y Hi???
  17++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKysgn                    equ UBnKysgn                ; INWK +5
  18++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKzlo                     equ UBnKzlo                 ; INWK +6
  19++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKzhi                     equ UBnKzhi                 ; INWK +7
  20++C015              ;; REDUDANT INWKzsgn                    equ UBnKzsgn                ; INWK +8
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ShipPosVars.asm
  20+ C015                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/RotationMatrixVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/RotationMatrixVars.asm
   1++C015              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C015              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C015 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C017              UBnkrotmatSidev             equ UBnkrotmatSidevX
   5++C017 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C019 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
   7++C01B 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15
   8++C01D              UBnkrotmatRoofv             equ UBnkrotmatRoofvX
   9++C01D 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17
  10++C01F 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +19
  11++C021 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +9
  12++C023              UBnkrotmatNosev             EQU UBnkrotmatNosevX
  13++C023 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +11
  14++C025 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +13
  15++C027
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/RotationMatrixVars.asm
  21+ C027                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm
   1++C027              ; -- Ship AI data
   2++C027 00           UBnKShipType                DB  0
   3++C028 00           UBnKspeed                   DB  0                       ; INWK +27
   4++C029 00           UBnKAccel                   DB  0                       ; INWK +28
   5++C02A 00           UBnKRotXCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +29
   6++C02B 00           UBnKRotZCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +30
   7++C02C 00           UBnKexplDsp                 DB  0                       ; INWK +31 clear exploding/display state|missiles
   8++C02D              ; Flags work as follows:
   9++C02D              ; 7 - Flag ship to be killed with debris
  10++C02D              ; 6 - Invisible/Erase (also mentions Laser Firing?)
  11++C02D              ; 5 - Ship is exploding if set
  12++C02D              ; 4 -
  13++C02D              ; 3 - Display state - Plot as a Dot
  14++C02D              ; 2 - Nbr of Missiles bit 2
  15++C02D              ; 1 - Nbr of Missiles bit 1
  16++C02D              ; 0 - Nbr of Missiles bit 0
  17++C02D 00           UBnkaiatkecm                DB  0                       ; INWK +32 ai_attack_univ_ecm i.e. AI type
  18++C02E 00           UBnkCam0yLo                 DB  0                       ; INWK +33 ????
  19++C02F 00           UBnkCam0yHi                 DB  0                       ; INWK +34?????
  20++C030 00           UbnKEnergy                  DB  0                       ; INWK +35
  21++C031              ; Flags work as follows:
  22++C031              ;Bit	Description
  23++C031              ;#0	Trader flag         * 0 = not a trader  * 1 = trader
  24++C031              ;                       80% of traders are peaceful and mind their own business plying their trade between the planet and space station, but 20% of them moonlight as bounty hunters (see bit #1)
  25++C031              ;                       Ships that are traders: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
  26++C031              ;#1 Bounty hunter flag  * 0 = not a bounty hunter* 1 = bounty hunter
  27++C031              ;                       If we are a fugitive or a serious offender and we bump into a bounty hunter, they will become hostile and attack us (see bit #2)
  28++C031              ;                       Ships that are bounty hunters: Viper, Fer-de-lance
  29++C031              ;#2	Hostile flag        * 0 = not hostile  * 1 = hostile
  30++C031              ;                       Hostile ships will attack us on sight; there are quite a few of them
  31++C031              ;                       Ships that are hostile: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Worm, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid, Thargon, Constrictor
  32++C031              ;#3	Pirate flag         * 0 = not a pirate * 1 = pirate
  33++C031              ;                       Hostile pirates will attack us on sight, but once we get inside the space station safe zone, they will stop
  34++C031              ;                       Ships that are pirates: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid
  35++C031              ;#4	Docking flag        * 0 = not docking * 1 = docking
  36++C031              ;                       Traders with their docking flag set fly towards the space station to try to dock, otherwise they aim for the planet
  37++C031              ;                       This flag is randomly set for traders when they are spawned
  38++C031              ;                       Ships that can be docking: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
  39++C031              ;#5	Innocent bystander  * 0 = normal * 1 = innocent bystander
  40++C031              ;                       If we attack an innocent ship within the space station safe zone, then the station will get angry with us and start spawning cops
  41++C031              ;                       Ships that are innocent bystanders: Shuttle, Transporter, Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Cougar
  42++C031              ;#6	Cop flag            * 0 = not a cop * 1 = cop
  43++C031              ;                       If we destroy a cop, then we instantly become a fugitive (the Transporter isn't actually a cop, but it's clearly under police protection)
  44++C031              ;                       Ships that are cops: Viper, Transporter
  45++C031              ;#7	Scooped, docked, escape pod flag
  46++C031              ;                       For spawned ships, this flag indicates that the ship been scooped or has docked (bit 7 is always clear on spawning)
  47++C031              ;                       For blueprints, this flag indicates whether the ship type has an escape pod fitted, so it can launch it when in dire straits
  48++C031              ;                       Ships that have escape pods: Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Viper, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III (pirate), Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Fer-de-lance
  49++C031
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm
  22+ C031
  23+ C031              ; Orientation Matrix [nosev x y z ] nose vector ( forward) 19 to 26
  24+ C031              ;                    [roofv x y z ] roof vector (up)
  25+ C031              ;                    [sidev x y z ] side vector (right)
  26+ C031              ;;rotXCounter                 equ UBnkrotXCounter         ; INWK +29
  27+ C031              ;;rotZCounter                 equ UBnkrotZCounter         ; INWK +30UBnkDrawCam0xLo   DB  0               ; XX18+0
  28+ C031 00           univRAT      DB  0               ; 99
  29+ C032 00           univRAT2     DB  0               ; 9A
  30+ C033 00           univRAT2Val  DB  0               ; 9A
  31+ C034

  43+ C091
  44+ C091
  45+ C091              ; Post clipping the results are now 8 bit
  46+ C091 00           UBnkVisibility              DB  0               ; replaces general purpose xx4 in rendering
  47+ C092 00           UBnKDrawAsDot               DB  0               ; if 0 then OK, if 1 then just draw dot of line heap
  48+ C093 00           UBnkProjectedY              DB  0
  49+ C094 00           UBnkProjectedX              DB  0
  50+ C095              UBnkProjected               equ UBnkProjectedY  ; resultant projected position
  51+ C095 00 00 00...  XX15Save                    DS  8
  52+ C09D 00 00 00...  XX15Save2                   DS  8
  53+ C0A5 00           VarBackface                 DB 0
  54+ C0A6              ; Heap (or array) information for lines and normals
  55+ C0A6              ; Coords are stored XY,XY,XY,XY
  56+ C0A6              ; Normals
  57+ C0A6              ; This needs re-oprganising now.
  58+ C0A6              ; Runtime Calculation Store
  59+ C0A6
  60+ C0A6              FaceArraySize               equ 30
  61+ C0A6              EdgeHeapSize                equ 40
  62+ C0A6              NodeArraySize               equ 40
  63+ C0A6              LineArraySize               equ 50
  64+ C0A6              ; Storage arrays for data
  65+ C0A6              ; Structure of arrays
  66+ C0A6              ; Visibility array  - 1 Byte per face/normal on ship model Bit 7 (or FF) visible, 0 Invisible
  67+ C0A6              ; Node array corresponds to a processed vertex from the ship model transformed into world coordinates and tracks the node list from model
  68+ C0A6              ; NodeArray         -  4 bytes per element      0           1            2          3
  69+ C0A6              ;                                               X Coord Lo  Y Coord Lo   Z CoordLo  Sign Bits 7 6 5 for X Y Z Signs (set = negative)
  70+ C0A6              ; Line Array        -  4 bytes per eleement     0           1            2          3
  71+ C0A6              ;                                               X1          Y1           X2         Y2
  72+ C0A6 00 00 00...  UbnkFaceVisArray            DS FaceArraySize            ; XX2 Up to 16 faces this may be normal list, each entry is controlled by bit 7, 1 visible, 0 hidden
  73+ C0C4 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray               DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  74+ C164 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray2              DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  75+ C204 00 00 00...  UbnkLineArray               DS LineArraySize * 4        ; XX19 Holds the clipped line details
  76+ C2CC              UBnkLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - UbnkLineArray
  77+ C2CC 00 00 00...  UbnkEdgeProcessedList DS EdgeHeapSize
  78+ C2F4              ; Array current Lengths
  79+ C2F4 00           UbnkFaceVisArrayLen         DS 1
  80+ C2F5 00           UBnkNodeArrayLen            DS 1
  81+ C2F6 00           UbnkLineArrayLen            DS 1                        ; total number of lines loaded to array
  82+ C2F7 00           UbnkLineArrayBytes          DS 1                        ; total number of bytes loaded to array  = array len * 4
  83+ C2F8              XX20                        equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  84+ C2F8              varXX20                     equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  85+ C2F8
  86+ C2F8
  87+ C2F8 00           UbnkEdgeHeapSize            DS 1
  88+ C2F9 00           UbnkEdgeHeapBytes           DS 1
  89+ C2FA 00           UBnkLinesHeapLen            DS 1
  90+ C2FB 00           UbnKEdgeHeapCounter         DS 1
  91+ C2FC 00           UbnKEdgeRadius              DS 1
  92+ C2FD 00           UbnKEdgeShipType            DS 1
  93+ C2FE 00           UbnKEdgeExplosionType       DS 1
  94+ C2FF
  95+ C2FF              ; Node heap is used to write out transformed Vertexs
  96+ C2FF
  97+ C2FF              ; Lines
  98+ C2FF 00 00 00     UBnkXX19                    DS  3
  99+ C302

 101+ C302 00           UBnkShipModelBank           DB  0
 102+ C303 00           UBnkShipModelNbr            DB  0

 125+ C31D              ShipAIFlagsAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipAIFlagsOffset
 126+ C31D              ; Static Ship Data. This is copied in when creating the universe object
 127+ C31D              XX0                         equ UBnkHullCopy        ; general hull index pointer
 128+ C31D 00 00 00...  UBnkHullVerticies           DS  300                 ; can only be 255
 129+ C449 00 00 00...  UBnkHullEdges               DS  1200                ; can be 255 * 4
 130+ C8F9 00 00 00...  UBnkHullNormals             DS  300                 ; can only be 255
 131+ CA25 0C           OrthagCountdown             DB  12
 132+ CA26
 133+ CA26              UBnkShipCopy                equ UBnkHullVerticies               ; Buffer for copy of ship data, for speed will copy to a local memory block, Cobra is around 400 bytes on creation of a new ship so should be plenty
 134+ CA26              UBnk_Data_len               EQU $ - StartOfUniv
 135+ CA26
 136+ CA26              ZeroUnivPitchAndRoll:   MACRO
 137+ CA26 ~                                    xor     a
 138+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 139+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 140+ CA26                                      ENDM
 141+ CA26
 142+ CA26              MaxUnivPitchAndRoll:    MACRO
 143+ CA26 ~                                    ld      a,127
 144+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 145+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 146+ CA26                                      ENDM
 147+ CA26
 148+ CA26              RandomUnivPitchAndRoll: MACRO
 149+ CA26 ~                                    call    doRandom
 150+ CA26 ~                                    or      %01101111
 151+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 152+ CA26 ~                                    call    doRandom
 153+ CA26 ~                                    or      %01101111
 154+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 155+ CA26                                      ENDM
 156+ CA26
 157+ CA26              RandomUnivSpeed:        MACRO
 158+ CA26 ~                                    call    doRandom
 159+ CA26 ~                                    and     31
 160+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKspeed),a
 161+ CA26                                      ENDM
 162+ CA26
 163+ CA26              ZeroUnivAccelleration:  MACRO
 164+ CA26 ~                                    xor     a
 165+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 166+ CA26                                      ENDM
 167+ CA26
 168+ CA26              AequN1xorN2:            MACRO  param1,param2
 169+ CA26 ~                                    ld      a,(param1)
 170+ CA26 ~                                    xor     param2
 171+ CA26                                      ENDM
 172+ CA26
 173+ CA26              N0equN1byN2div256:      MACRO param1,param2,param3
 174+ CA26 ~                                    ld      a,param3                        ;
 175+ CA26 ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 176+ CA26 ~                                    ld      a,param2                        ; A = XX16 element
 177+ CA26 ~                                    ld      d,a
 178+ CA26 ~                                    mul
 179+ CA26 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 180+ CA26 ~                                    ld      (param1),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 181+ CA26                                      ENDM
 182+ CA26
 183+ CA26              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 184+ CA26 21 00 C0     ResetUBnkData:          ld      hl,StartOfUniv
 185+ CA29 11 26 0A                             ld      de,UBnk_Data_len
 186+ CA2C AF                                   xor     a
 187+ CA2D CD 71 93                             call    memfill_dma
 188+ CA30 C9                                   ret
 189+ CA31              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 190+ CA31 21 0C C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 191+ CA34 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 192+ CA36 AF                                   xor     a
 193+ CA37 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 194+ CA38 23                                   inc     hl
 195+ CA39 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 196+ CA3B C9                                   ret
 197+ CA3C
 198+ CA3C              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ CA3C              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 200+ CA3C CD 0F CC     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 201+ CA3F                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 201+ CA3F CD 40 9C    >                        call    doRandom
 201+ CA42 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 201+ CA44 32 2A C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 201+ CA47 CD 40 9C    >                        call    doRandom
 201+ CA4A F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 201+ CA4C 32 2B C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 202+ CA4F CD 40 9C                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 203+ CA52 32 0C C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 204+ CA55 32 0F C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 205+ CA58 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 206+ CA59 47                                   ld      b,a
 207+ CA5A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 208+ CA5C 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 209+ CA5F 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 210+ CA60 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 211+ CA61 47                                   ld      b,a
 212+ CA62 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 213+ CA64 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 214+ CA67 CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 215+ CA69 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 216+ CA6A E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 217+ CA6C 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 218+ CA6F CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 219+ CA71 78                                   ld      a,b
 220+ CA72 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 221+ CA74 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 222+ CA75 32 0D C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 223+ CA78 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 224+ CA7A 98                                   sbc     b
 225+ CA7B 99                                   sbc     c
 226+ CA7C 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 227+ CA7F              .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ReturnIfMemEquN ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeJunk
 227+ CA7F 3A 1A C3    >                        ld     a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 227+ CA82 FE 03       >                        cp     ShipTypeJunk
 227+ CA84 C0          >                        ret    nz
 228+ CA85 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 229+ CA86 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 230+ CA87 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 231+ CA89 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 232+ CA8C C9                                   ret
 233+ CA8D
 234+ CA8D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 235+ CA8D              ; This sets current univrse object to space station
 236+ CA8D 3E 81        ResetStationLaunch:     ld  a,%10000001
 237+ CA8F 32 2D C0                             ld  (UBnkaiatkecm),a                    ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 238+ CA92 AF                                   xor a
 239+ CA93 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 240+ CA96 32 1B C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 241+ CA99 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 242+ CA9B 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 243+ CA9E 21 00 00     .SetPosBehindUs:        ld      hl,$0000
 244+ CAA1 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 245+ CAA4 21 00 00                             ld      hl,$0000
 246+ CAA7 22 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 247+ CAAA 21 B0 01                             ld      hl,$01B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 248+ CAAD 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 249+ CAB0 AF                                   xor     a
 250+ CAB1 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 251+ CAB4 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 252+ CAB7 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 253+ CAB9 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 254+ CABC CD 34 CC     .SetOrientation:        call    LaunchedOrientation             ; set initial facing
 255+ CABF                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 256+ CABF              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 257+ CABF
 258+ CABF 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 259+ CAC0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 260+ CAC2 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 261+ CAC3 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 262+ CAC4                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 262+ CAC4 FA DC CA    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 263+ CAC7 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 264+ CAC8 B2                                   or      d
 265+ CAC9                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 265+ CAC9 FA CE CA    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 266+ CACC 19                                   add     hl,de
 267+ CACD C9                                   ret
 268+ CACE 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 269+ CACF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 270+ CAD1 67                                   ld      h,a
 271+ CAD2 7A                                   ld      a,d
 272+ CAD3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 273+ CAD5 57                                   ld      d,a
 274+ CAD6 19                                   add     hl,de
 275+ CAD7 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 276+ CAD9 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 277+ CADA 67                                   ld      h,a
 278+ CADB C9                                   ret
 279+ CADC 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 280+ CADD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 281+ CADF 67                                   ld      h,a
 282+ CAE0 7A                                   ld      a,d
 283+ CAE1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 284+ CAE3 57                                   ld      d,a
 285+ CAE4 B7                                   or      a
 286+ CAE5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 287+ CAE7 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 288+ CAE9 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 289+ CAEA B4                                   or      h
 290+ CAEB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 291+ CAEC C9                                   ret
 292+ CAED              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 292+ CAED AF          >                    xor a
 292+ CAEE 95          >                    sub l
 292+ CAEF 6F          >                    ld l,a
 292+ CAF0 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 292+ CAF1 94          >                    sub h
 292+ CAF2 67          >                    ld h,a
 293+ CAF3 78                                   ld      a,b
 294+ CAF4 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 295+ CAF6 B4                                   or      h
 296+ CAF7 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 297+ CAF8 C9                                   ret
 298+ CAF9
 299+ CAF9              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 300+ CAF9 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 301+ CAFA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 302+ CAFC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 303+ CAFD AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 304+ CAFE                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 304+ CAFE FA 2C CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 305+ CB01 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 306+ CB02 B2                                   or      d
 307+ CB03                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 307+ CB03 FA 0D CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 308+ CB06 B7                                   or      a
 309+ CB07 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 310+ CB09                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 310+ CB09 FA 20 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 311+ CB0C C9                                   ret
 312+ CB0D 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 313+ CB0E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 314+ CB10 67                                   ld      h,a
 315+ CB11 7A                                   ld      a,d
 316+ CB12 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 317+ CB14 57                                   ld      d,a
 318+ CB15 B7                                   or      a
 319+ CB16 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 320+ CB18                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 320+ CB18 FA 20 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 321+ CB1B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 322+ CB1C F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 323+ CB1E 67                                   ld      h,a
 324+ CB1F C9                                   ret
 325+ CB20              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 325+ CB20 AF          >                    xor a
 325+ CB21 95          >                    sub l
 325+ CB22 6F          >                    ld l,a
 325+ CB23 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 325+ CB24 94          >                    sub h
 325+ CB25 67          >                    ld h,a
 326+ CB26 78                                   ld      a,b
 327+ CB27 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 328+ CB29 B4                                   or      h
 329+ CB2A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 330+ CB2B C9                                   ret
 331+ CB2C B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 332+ CB2D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 333+ CB2E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 334+ CB30 67                                   ld      h,a
 335+ CB31 7A                                   ld      a,d
 336+ CB32 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 337+ CB34 57                                   ld      d,a
 338+ CB35 19                                   add     hl,de
 339+ CB36 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 340+ CB37 B4                                   or      h
 341+ CB38 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 342+ CB39 C9                                   ret
 343+ CB3A
 344+ CB3A
 345+ CB3A              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 345+ CB3A CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 345+ CB3C C2 4D CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 346+ CB3F              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 346+ CB3F CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 346+ CB41 C2 4D CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 347+ CB44 ED 52        SBCHLDEhlPosDePos:      sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 348+ CB46 C9                                   ret
 349+ CB47 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlPosDeNeg:      res     7,d
 350+ CB49 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 351+ CB4A CB FA                                set     7,d
 352+ CB4C C9                                   ret
 353+ CB4D CB BC        SBCHLDEhlNeg:           res     7,h
 354+ CB4F                                      JumpOnBitSet d,7,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 354+ CB4F CB 7A       >                        bit 	7,d
 354+ CB51 C2 59 CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 355+ CB54 ED 52        SBCHLDEhlNegdePos:      sbc     hl,de                       ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 356+ CB56 CB FC                                set     7,h
 357+ CB58 C9                                   ret
 358+ CB59 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 359+ CB5B 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 360+ CB5C CB FA                                set     7,d
 361+ CB5E CB FC                                set     7,h
 362+ CB60 C9                                   ret
 363+ CB61
 364+ CB61              ; Roate around axis
 365+ CB61              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 366+ CB61              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 367+ CB61              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 368+ CB61              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 369+ CB61              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 370+ CB61              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 371+ CB61              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 372+ CB61              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 373+ CB61              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 374+ CB61 2A 97 96     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 375+ CB64 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 376+ CB65 23                                   inc     hl
 377+ CB66 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 378+ CB67 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 379+ CB68 7C                                   ld      a,h
 380+ CB69 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 381+ CB6B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 382+ CB6D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 383+ CB6E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 384+ CB70 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 385+ CB72 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 386+ CB73 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 387+ CB75 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 388+ CB76 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 389+ CB77 CD F9 CA                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 390+ CB7A              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ CB7A E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 392+ CB7B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 393+ CB7C 32 C0 97                             ld      (varR),a
 394+ CB7F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 395+ CB80 32 C1 97                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 396+ CB83              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 397+ CB83 2A 99 96                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 398+ CB86 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 399+ CB87 23                                   inc     hl
 400+ CB88 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 401+ CB89 7A                                   ld      a,d
 402+ CB8A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 403+ CB8C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 404+ CB8E 7A                                   ld      a,d
 405+ CB8F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 406+ CB91 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 407+ CB92                                      ShiftDERight1
 407+ CB92 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 407+ CB94 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 408+ CB96                                      ShiftDERight1
 408+ CB96 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 408+ CB98 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 409+ CB9A                                      ShiftDERight1
 409+ CB9A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 409+ CB9C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 410+ CB9E                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 410+ CB9E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 410+ CBA0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 411+ CBA2 3A 32 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 412+ CBA5 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 413+ CBA7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 414+ CBA9 B2                                   or      d
 415+ CBAA 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 416+ CBAB              ;;; ld      a,e
 417+ CBAB              ;;;     or      iyh
 418+ CBAB              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 419+ CBAB              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 420+ CBAB E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 421+ CBAC                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 422+ CBAC              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 423+ CBAC CD BF CA                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 424+ CBAF E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 425+ CBB0              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 426+ CBB0              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 427+ CBB0 2A 99 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 428+ CBB3 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 429+ CBB4 23                               inc     hl
 430+ CBB5 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 431+ CBB6 EB                               ex      de,hl
 432+ CBB7 7C                               ld      a,h
 433+ CBB8 E6 80                            and     $80
 434+ CBBA FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 435+ CBBC 7C                               ld      a,h
 436+ CBBD E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 437+ CBBF CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 438+ CBC1 5F                               ld      e,a
 439+ CBC2 FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 440+ CBC4 57                               ld      d,a
 441+ CBC5 B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 442+ CBC6 CD F9 CA                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 443+ CBC9              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 444+ CBC9 E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 445+ CBCA 7D                               ld      a,l
 446+ CBCB 32 AE 96                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 447+ CBCE 7C                               ld      a,h
 448+ CBCF E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 449+ CBD1 32 DC 97                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 450+ CBD4              ;-- Set up TQ
 451+ CBD4 2A 97 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 452+ CBD7              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 453+ CBD7 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 454+ CBD8 23                               inc     hl
 455+ CBD9 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 456+ CBDA 7A                               ld      a,d
 457+ CBDB E6 80                            and     $80
 458+ CBDD FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 459+ CBDF 7A                               ld      a,d
 460+ CBE0 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 461+ CBE2 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 462+ CBE3                                  ShiftDERight1
 462+ CBE3 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 462+ CBE5 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 463+ CBE7                                  ShiftDERight1
 463+ CBE7 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 463+ CBE9 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 464+ CBEB                                  ShiftDERight1
 464+ CBEB CB 3A       >			   srl d
 464+ CBED CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 465+ CBEF                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 465+ CBEF CB 3A       >			   srl d
 465+ CBF1 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 466+ CBF3 3A 32 C0                         ld      a,(univRAT2)
 467+ CBF6 FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 468+ CBF8 E6 80                            and     $80
 469+ CBFA B2                               or      d
 470+ CBFB 57                               ld      d,a
 471+ CBFC              ;;; ld      a,e
 472+ CBFC              ;;;     or      iyh
 473+ CBFC              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 474+ CBFC E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 475+ CBFD              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 476+ CBFD CD F9 CA                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 477+ CC00              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 478+ CC00 EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 479+ CC01 2A 99 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 480+ CC04 73                               ld      (hl),e
 481+ CC05 23                               inc     hl
 482+ CC06 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 483+ CC07              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 484+ CC07 D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 485+ CC08 2A 97 96                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 486+ CC0B 73                               ld      (hl),e
 487+ CC0C 23                               inc     hl
 488+ CC0D 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 489+ CC0E C9                               ret
 490+ CC0F
 491+ CC0F                                  include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++CC0F              InitialiseOrientation:
   2++CC0F              ZI1:
   3++CC0F              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   4++CC0F              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   5++CC0F              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   6++CC0F 21 00 00         ld      hl, 0
   7++CC12 22 17 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++CC15 22 19 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++CC18 22 1B C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++CC1B 22 1F C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CC1E 22 21 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CC21 22 23 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  13++CC24 21 00 60         ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  14++CC27                  ;ld      hl,1
  15++CC27 22 15 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CC2A 22 1D C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CC2D 21 00 E0         ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  18++CC30 22 25 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  19++CC33 C9               ret
  20++CC34
  21++CC34              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  22++CC34              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  23++CC34              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  24++CC34
  25++CC34              LaunchedOrientation:
  26++CC34 CD 0F CC         call    InitialiseOrientation
  27++CC37                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  27++CC37 3A 22 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  27++CC3A EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  27++CC3C 32 22 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  28++CC3F                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  28++CC3F 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  28++CC42 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  28++CC44 32 24 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  29++CC47                  FlipMemSign UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  29++CC47 3A 26 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  29++CC4A EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  29++CC4C 32 26 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  30++CC4F C9               ret
  31++CC50
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 492+ CC50                                  include "Universe/Ships/Tactics.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/Tactics.asm
   1++CC50              ;Ship Tactics
   2++CC50              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
   3++CC50 21 1B C3     ForceAngryDirect:       ld      hl,ShipNewBitsAddr
   4++CC53 CB E6                                set     ShipIsHostile, (hl)
   5++CC55 C9                                   ret
   6++CC56
   7++CC56              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
   8++CC56 3A 1B C3     MakeAngry:              ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
   9++CC59 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; copy to b in case we want it later
  10++CC5A                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbAngry
  10++CC5A 3A 1A C3    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  10++CC5D FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
  10++CC5F CA 82 CC    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbAngry
  11++CC62 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
  12++CC64 C4 89 CC                             call    nz, .setStationAngry                       ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
  13++CC67 3A 2D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
  14++CC6A                                      ReturnIfAIsZero                                 ; if 0 then no AI attached
  14++CC6A A7          >                        and a
  14++CC6B C8          >                        ret    z
  15++CC6C F6 80                                or      Bit7Only                                ; set AI Enabled set to ensure its set
  16++CC6E 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                        ; .
  17++CC71 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
  18++CC72                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
  18++CC72 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
  18++CC74 32 29 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
  19++CC77 CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
  20++CC79 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .

  22++CC7F                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
  22++CC7F E6 01       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
  22++CC81 C8          >                        ret     z
  23++CC82 78           .SetNewbAngry:          ld      a,b
  24++CC83 F6 04                                or      ShipIsHostile
  25++CC85 32 1B C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a

  27++CC89 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
  27++CC8B 32 81 98    >                        ld      (SetStationAngryFlag),a
  28++CC8E C9                                   ret

  49++CC8F              ;            else if ship is angry at us

  53++CC8F              ;                                 set blastcheckcounter to slotlist length
  54++CC8F              ;                                 set shiphitbymissileflag to FE (general blast)

  57++CC8F              ;                         end if

  64++CC8F              ;                                 end if
  65++CC8F              ;                                 if we are in range of missle blast

  67++CC8F              ;                                 end if
  68++CC8F              ;                                 return
  69++CC8F              ;                         end if
  70++CC8F              ;                 end if
  71++CC8F              ;         end if

  88++CC8F              ;                         jump to part 7

 103++CC8F              ;                                        end if

 128++CC8F              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5

 493+ CC8F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 494+ CC8F              OrientateVertex:
 495+ CC8F
 496+ CC8F              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 497+ CC8F              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 498+ CC8F              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 499+ CC8F              ;
 500+ CC8F
 501+ CC8F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ CC8F              TransposeVertex:
 503+ CC8F              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 504+ CC8F              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 505+ CC8F              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 506+ CC8F              VectorToVertex:
 507+ CC8F              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 508+ CC8F              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 509+ CC8F              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 510+ CC8F
 511+ CC8F              Project:
 512+ CC8F 2A 0C C0     PROJ:                   ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; Project K+INWK(x,y)/z to K3,K4 for center to screen
 513+ CC92 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl
 514+ CC95 3A 0E C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 515+ CC98 CD 6F A7                             call    PLS6                            ; returns result in K (0 1) (unsigned) and K (3) = sign note to no longer does 2's C
 516+ CC9B D8                                   ret     c                               ; carry means don't print
 517+ CC9C 2A D3 97                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 518+ CC9F                                      ; Now the question is as hl is the fractional part, should this be multiplied by 127 to get the actual range
 519+ CC9F 3E 80                                ld      a,ViewCenterX
 520+ CCA1 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 521+ CCA3 22 E6 97                             ld      (varK3),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 522+ CCA6 2A 0F C0     ProjectY:               ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 523+ CCA9 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl
 524+ CCAC 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 525+ CCAF CD 6F A7                             call    PLS6
 526+ CCB2 D8                                   ret     c
 527+ CCB3 2A D3 97                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 528+ CCB6 3E 40                                ld      a,ViewCenterY
 529+ CCB8 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 530+ CCBA 22 EC 97                             ld      (varK4),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 531+ CCBD C9                                   ret

 533+ CCBE                                      include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"

  30++CCF0                                      ;       push    af
  31++CCF0                                      ;       ld      a,iyh

  33++CCF0                                      ;       pop     af

  35++CCF2 20 0A                                jr      nz, .LL107

  38++CCF9 20 03                                jr      nz,.LL107
  39++CCFB FD 26 00                             ld      iyh, 0                      ; else iyh = regX = 0                                                                        -- X2Y2 on screen
  40++CCFE                                      ;        push    af
  41++CCFE                                      ;        ld      a,iyh
