  34++D245              CopyXX15ToXX18Scaled:
  35++D245              CopyScaledMatrixToDrawCam:
  36++D245                      ldCopyByte UBnkZScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0zSgn  ; XX15+5 => XX18+8
  36++D245 3A 7E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  36++D248 32 75 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zSgn),a
  37++D24B                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  37++D24B 3A 79 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
  37++D24E 32 6D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a
  38++D251                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  38++D251 3A 7A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
  38++D254 32 6F C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xSgn),a
  39++D257                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  39++D257 3A 7B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
  39++D25A 32 70 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a
  40++D25D                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  40++D25D 3A 7C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
  40++D260 32 72 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0ySgn),a
  41++D263                      ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6
  41++D263 3A 7D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
  41++D266 32 73 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a
  42++D269 C9                   ret
  43++D26A
  44++D26A
  45++D26A              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  46++D26A              LL94Z:
  47++D26A 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  48++D26C 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  49++D26E 3A 7D C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  50++D271 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  51++D272 3A 7E C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  52++D275 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  53++D276 3A 73 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  54++D279 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  55++D27A 3A 75 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  56++D27D 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  57++D27E CD C3 AD             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  58++D281 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  59++D282 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  60++D283 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  61++D284 32 7E C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  62++D287 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  63++D288 32 7D C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  64++D28B              LL94X:
  65++D28B 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  66++D28D 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  67++D28F 3A 79 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  68++D292 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  69++D293 3A 7A C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  70++D296 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  71++D297 3A 6D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  72++D29A 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  73++D29B 3A 6F C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  74++D29E 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  75++D29F CD C3 AD             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  76++D2A2 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  77++D2A3 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  78++D2A4 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  79++D2A5 32 7A C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  80++D2A8 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  81++D2A9 32 79 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  82++D2AC              LL94Y:
  83++D2AC 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  84++D2AE 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  85++D2B0 3A 7B C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  86++D2B3 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  87++D2B4 3A 7C C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  88++D2B7 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  89++D2B8 3A 70 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
  90++D2BB 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  91++D2BC 3A 72 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
  92++D2BF 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  93++D2C0 CD C3 AD             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  94++D2C3 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  95++D2C4 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  96++D2C5 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  97++D2C6 32 7C C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
  98++D2C9 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  99++D2CA 32 7B C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 100++D2CD C9                   ret
 101++D2CE
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 697+ D2CE                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D2CE              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D2CE              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D2CE                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D2CE 3A 7F C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D2D1 32 79 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D2D4                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D2D4 3A 81 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D2D7 32 7B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D2DA                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D2DA 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D2DD 32 7D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D2E0 C9                   ret
   7++D2E1
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 698+ D2E1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 699+ D2E1                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D2E1              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D2E1              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D2E1              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D2E1              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D2E1              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D2E1              ;;; R = T
   7++D2E1              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D2E1              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D2E1              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D2E1              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D2E1              ;;; R = T
  12++D2E1              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D2E1
  14++D2E1
  15++D2E1
  16++D2E1
  17++D2E1
  18++D2E1              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D2E1 ~            						mul
  20++D2E1 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D2E1              						ENDM
  22++D2E1              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D2E1 3A 7F C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D2E4                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D2E4 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D2E5 CA 02 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  25++D2E8 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D2E9 3A 79 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D2EC 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D2ED                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D2ED A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D2EE CA 02 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  29++D2F1 ED 30        		mul
  30++D2F3 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D2F4 3A 80 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D2F7 21 7A C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D2FA AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D2FB E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D2FD FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D2FF C3 06 D3             jp          dotmuly
  37++D302              dotxskipzero:
  38++D302 AF                   xor         a
  39++D303 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D304 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D306              dotmuly:
  42++D306              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D306 3A 81 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D309                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D309 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D30A CA 29 D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  45++D30D 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D30E 3A 7B C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D311                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D311 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D312 CA 29 D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  48++D315 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D316 ED 30                mul
  50++D318 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D319 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D31B 3A 82 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D31E 21 7C C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D321 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D322 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D324 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D326 C3 2D D3             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D329              dotyskipzero:
  59++D329 AF                   xor         a
  60++D32A 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D32B DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D32D              dotaddxy:
  63++D32D              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D32D 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D32F 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D330 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D332 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D333 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D335 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D336 CD C3 AD             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D339 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D33A 3A 83 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D33D                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D33D A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D33E CA 63 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  74++D341 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D342 3A 7D C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D345                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D345 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D346 CA 63 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  77++D349 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D34A ED 30                mul
  79++D34C E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D34D 3A 7E C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D350 21 84 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D353 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D354 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D356 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D357 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D358 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D359 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D35B CD C3 AD             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D35E 32 C1 97             ld          (varS),a
  90++D361 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D362 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D363              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D363 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D364 32 C1 97             ld          (varS),a
  95++D367 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D368 C9                   ret
  97++D369              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D369              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D369              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D369              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D369              ;;;;		mul
 104++D369              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D369              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D369              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D369              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D369              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D369              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D369              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D369              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D369              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D369              ;;;;       mul
 117++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D369              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D369              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D369              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D369              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D369              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D369              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D369              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D369              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D369              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D369              ;;;;       mul
 132++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D369              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D369              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D369              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D369              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D369              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D369              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D369              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D369              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D369
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 700+ D369              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 701+ D369              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 702+ D369                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D369              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D369              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D369              ScaleNormal:
   4++D369              LL93:
   5++D369 3A C6 97             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D36C DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D36E 3A 7D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D371 DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D373 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D374              ScaleLoop:
  11++D374              LL933:
  12++D374 21 79 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D377 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D379 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D37A 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D37B CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D37D 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D37E 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D37F CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D381 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D382 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D384 F2 74 D3             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D387 C9                   ret
  24++D388
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 703+ D388              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 704+ D388                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D388              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D388              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D388 3A 16 C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D38B 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D38C              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D38C 3A 74 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D38F 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D390                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D390 A7          >                        and a
   8++D391 C8          >                        ret    z
   9++D392              LL90Loop:
  10++D392              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D392 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D393                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D393 2A 70 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D396 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D398 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D39A 22 70 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D39D                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D39D 2A 6D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D3A0 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D3A2 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D3A4 22 6D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D3A7                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D3A7 2A 73 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D3AA CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D3AC CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D3AE 22 73 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D3B1 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D3B2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D3B2 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  16++D3B4 C2 92 D3    >                        jp	nz,LL90Loop
  17++D3B7 C9                   ret
  18++D3B8
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 705+ D3B8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 706+ D3B8
 707+ D3B8              ; Backface cull
 708+ D3B8              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 709+ D3B8              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 710+ D3B8              ;
 711+ D3B8
 712+ D3B8                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D3B8 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D3B9 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D3BA E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D3BC 32 7A C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D3BF 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D3C0 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D3C2 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D3C3 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D3C5 32 7C C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D3C8 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D3C9 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D3CB E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D3CD 32 7E C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D3D0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D3D1 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D3D2 32 79 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D3D5 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D3D6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D3D7 32 7B C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D3DA 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D3DB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D3DC 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D3DF C9                                   ret
  24++D3E0
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 713+ D3E0                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"

   1++D3E0 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D3E1 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D3E2 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D3E4 32 80 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D3E7 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D3E8 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D3EA 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D3EB E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D3ED 32 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D3F0 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D3F1 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D3F3 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D3F5 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D3F8 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D3F9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D3FA 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D3FD 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D3FE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D3FF 32 81 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D402 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D403 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D404 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D407 C9                                   ret

# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 714+ D408              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 715+ D408              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 716+ D408              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 717+ D408              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 718+ D408              ; return if no faces
 719+ D408              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 720+ D408              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 721+ D408              ; While Z hi <> 0
 722+ D408              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 723+ D408              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 724+ D408              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 725+ D408              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 726+ D408              ; Loop
 727+ D408              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 728+ D408              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 729+ D408              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 730+ D408              ; For each face
 731+ D408              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 732+ D408              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 733+ D408              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 734+ D408              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 735+ D408              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 736+ D408              ;        else
 737+ D408              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 738+ D408              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 739+ D408              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 740+ D408              ;           While X >= 0
 741+ D408              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 742+ D408              ;              if  x >= 0
 743+ D408              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 744+ D408              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 745+ D408              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 746+ D408              ;           loop
 747+ D408              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 748+ D408              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 749+ D408              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 750+ D408              ;               X = 1
 751+ D408              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 752+ D408              ;           else
 753+ D408              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 754+ D408              ;           endif
 755+ D408              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 756+ D408              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 757+ D408              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 758+ D408              ;               X = 1
 759+ D408              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 760+ D408              ;           else
 761+ D408              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 762+ D408              ;           endif
 763+ D408              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 764+ D408              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 765+ D408              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 766+ D408              ;               X = 1
 767+ D408              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 768+ D408              ;           else
 769+ D408              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 770+ D408              ;           endif
 771+ D408              ;        endif
 772+ D408              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 773+ D408              ;        if dot product < 0
 774+ D408              ;           set face visible
 775+ D408              ;        else
 776+ D408              ;           set face invisible
 777+ D408              ;        end if
 778+ D408              ;     else
 779+ D408              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 780+ D408              ;     end if
 781+ D408              ; Next Face
 782+ D408
 783+ D408 DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 784+ D40A F8                                   ret     m
 785+ D40B 21 79 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 786+ D40E CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 787+ D410 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 788+ D411 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 789+ D412 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 790+ D414 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 791+ D415 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 792+ D416 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)

 794+ D41B C9                                   ret
 795+ D41C
 796+ D41C 21 6D C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
 797+ D41F CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 798+ D421 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 799+ D422 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 800+ D423 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2

 802+ D426 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 803+ D427 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)

 805+ D42A
 806+ D42A              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 807+ D42A
 808+ D42A              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 809+ D42A              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 810+ D42A              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 811+ D42A              ;
 812+ D42A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 813+ D42A              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 814+ D42A              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 815+ D42A              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 816+ D42A              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 817+ D42A
 818+ D42A              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
 819+ D42A 21 34 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 820+ D42D CD 99 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 821+ D430 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 822+ D431 7D                                   ld      a,l
 823+ D432 B0                                   or      b
 824+ D433 32 80 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 825+ D436 7D                                   ld      a,l
 826+ D437 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 827+ D43A
 828+ D43A 21 3A C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 829+ D43D CD 99 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 830+ D440 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 831+ D441 7D                                   ld      a,l
 832+ D442 B0                                   or      b
 833+ D443 32 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 834+ D446 7D                                   ld      a,l
 835+ D447 32 81 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 836+ D44A
 837+ D44A 21 40 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 838+ D44D CD 99 8E                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 839+ D450 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 840+ D451 7D                                   ld      a,l
 841+ D452 B0                                   or      b
 842+ D453 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 843+ D456 7D                                   ld      a,l
 844+ D457 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 845+ D45A C9                                   ret

   1++D45B 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D45C              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D45C              ; EE29:
   4++D45C
   5++D45C              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D45C              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D45C              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D45C              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D45C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D45C              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D45C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D45C              ;
  13++D45C              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D45C              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D45C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D45C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D45C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D45C              ;
  19++D45C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D45C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D45C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D45C              ;
  23++D45C              ; so
  24++D45C              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D45C              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D45C              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D45C              ;
  28++D45C              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D45C              ;
  30++D45C              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D45C              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D45C              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D45C              ;
  34++D45C
  35++D45C
  36++D45C
  37++D45C 3A 74 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D45F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D45F A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D460 CA 8D D4    >                        jp	z, .ScaleDone
  39++D463 2A 6D C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D466 ED 5B 70 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D46A ED 4B 73 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D46E FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D470                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D470 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D472 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D474                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D474 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D476 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D478                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D478 CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D47A CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D47C 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D47D                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D47D FE 00       >                        cp	0
  47++D47F C2 6E D4    >                        jp	nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D482 22 6D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D485 ED 53 70 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D489 ED 43 73 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D48D FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D48F 32 C6 97                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D492 C9                                   ret

 213++D493              ;;;;;; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 214++D493              ;;;;;.ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
 215++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
 216++D493              ;;;;;    call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 217++D493              ;;;;;    call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 218++D493              ;;;;;;    call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 219++D493              ;;;;;    call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 220++D493              ;;;;;
 221++D493              ;;;;;
 222++D493              ;;;;;
 223++D493              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; copy DrawCam to Xx15
 224++D493              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation   ; Xx12 = XX15 (face normal) dot rotation matrix
 225++D493              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18              ; now XX18 = dot product
 226++D493              ;;;;;.ProcessNormals:        ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 227++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varV),hl
 228++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 229++D493              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 230++D493              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 231++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
 232++D493              ;;;;;                        xor     a
 233++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 234++D493              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 235++D493              ;;;;;                        push    bc
 236++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 237++D493              ;;;;;                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 238++D493              ;;;;;                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 239++D493              ;;;;;.CheckFaceVisibility:   call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; Get Face data into XX12
 240++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(varXX17)                  ; if scale factor < 4 then skip next bit
 241++D493              ;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
 242++D493              ;;;;;.LargeScaleFactor:      call    CopyXX18toXX15
 243++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      .LL89
 244++D493              ;;;;;.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
 245++D493              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 246++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18),a
 247++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 248++D493              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 249++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 250++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 251++D493              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 252++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 253++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 254++D493              ;;;;;.LL92:                  ld      b,a
 255++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 256++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 257++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 258++D493              ;;;;;.LL93                   dec     b
 259++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      m, .LL94
 260++D493              ;;;;;.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 261++D493              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 262++D493              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 263++D493              ;;;;;                        dec     b
 264++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 265++D493              ;;;;;.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 266++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 267++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 268++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 269++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 270++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 271++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 272++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 273++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 274++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 275++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 276++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 277++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 278++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 279++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 280++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 281++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 282++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 283++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 284++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 285++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 286++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 287++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 288++D493              ;;;;;.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 289++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 290++D493              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 291++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 292++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 293++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 294++D493              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 295++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a
 296++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 297++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 298++D493              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 299++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 300++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D493              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 306++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 307++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D493              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D493              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D493              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D493              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D493              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D493              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D493              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D493              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D493              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D493              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D493              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D493              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D493              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D493              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D493              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D493              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D493              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D493              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D493              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D493              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D493              ;;;;;
 333++D493 00           XX4Distance             DB      0
 334++D494
 335++D494
 336++D494
 337++D494 3A 14 C0     CheckDistance:          ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 338++D497 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 339++D499 20 3E                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 340++D49B 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 341++D49E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 342++D49F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 342++D49F FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 342++D4A1 D2 D9 D4    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 343++D4A4 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 344++D4A8 CD 7A AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 345++D4AB 38 2C                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 346++D4AD ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 347++D4B1 CD 7A AB                             call    compare16HLDE
 348++D4B4 38 23                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 349++D4B6              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 349++D4B6 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D4B8 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D4BA                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D4BA CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D4BC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D4BE                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 351++D4BE CB 3C       >			   srl h
 351++D4C0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 352++D4C2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 353++D4C3 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 354++D4C5              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 354++D4C5 C2 DB D4    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 355++D4C8                                      ; Check visbility distance
 356++D4C8              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 357++D4C8 7D                                   ld      a,l
 358++D4C9 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 359++D4CA CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 360++D4CC CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D4CE CB 3F                                srl     a
 362++D4D0 32 93 D4                             ld      (XX4Distance),a             ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 363++D4D3                                      SetATrue
 363++D4D3 AF          >                        xor     a
 364++D4D4 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a           ; set draw as dot to 0, i.e. false
 365++D4D7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 365++D4D7 B7          >                        or a
 366++D4D8 C9                                   ret
 367++D4D9              .ShipNoDraw:            SetCarryFlag                        ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 367++D4D9 37          >                        scf
 368++D4DA C9                                   ret
 369++D4DB              .ShipIsADot:            SetMemFalse UBnKDrawAsDot           ; use the same logic as process nodes to do 1 point
 369++D4DB 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 369++D4DD 32 92 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a
 370++D4E0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 370++D4E0 B7          >                        or a
 371++D4E1 C9                                   ret
 372++D4E2
 373++D4E2
 374++D4E2              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 375++D4E2              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 375++D4E2 3A 10 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 375++D4E5 A7          >                        and a
 375++D4E6 C8          >                        ret    z
 376++D4E7                                     ; break
 377++D4E7 CD 2F CF                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 378++D4EA CD 2D 90                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 379++D4ED CD E5 D1                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 380++D4F0                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 381++D4F0 3A 16 C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 382++D4F3 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 383++D4F5              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 384++D4F5 CD 5C D4                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 385++D4F8 CD FE D1                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 386++D4FB CD 84 8F     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 387++D4FE CD 76 D1                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 388++D501 21 F9 C8     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 389++D504 22 B3 96                             ld      (varV),hl
 390++D507 3A 10 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 391++D50A CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 392++D50C CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 393++D50E 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 394++D50F AF                                   xor     a
 395++D510 32 5B D4                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 396++D513 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 397++D514 C5                                   push    bc
 398++D515 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 399++D516 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 400++D518 E5                                   push    hl
 401++D519 21 93 D4                             ld      hl,XX4Distance
 402++D51C BE                                   cp      (hl)
 403++D51D E1                                   pop     hl
 404++D51E DA 63 D6                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 405++D521              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 406++D521 CD E0 D3     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 407++D524 3A C6 97                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 408++D527 47                                   ld      b,a
 409++D528                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 409++D528 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 409++D52A DA 65 D5    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 410++D52D CD C0 D1     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 411++D530 C3 F4 D5                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 412++D533 3A 6D C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 413++D536 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 414++D538 32 6D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 415++D53B 3A 73 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 416++D53E CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 417++D540 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 418++D543 3A 70 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 419++D546 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 420++D548 32 70 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 421++D54B 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 422++D54D                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 422++D54D 3A 79 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 422++D550 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 422++D552 32 79 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 423++D555                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 423++D555 3A 7B C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 423++D558 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 423++D55A 32 7B C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 424++D55D                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 424++D55D 3A 7D C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 424++D560 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 424++D562 32 7D C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 425++D565              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 426++D565              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 427++D565 CD 9B D1                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 428++D568 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 429++D569 FA 88 D5                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 430++D56C              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 430++D56C 3A 79 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 430++D56F CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 430++D571 32 79 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 431++D574                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 431++D574 3A 7B C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 431++D577 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 431++D579 32 7B C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 432++D57C                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 432++D57C 3A 7D C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 432++D57F CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 432++D581 32 7D C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 433++D584 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 434++D585 F2 6C D5                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 435++D588              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 436++D588              ; Add normal to XX15
 437++D588              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 438++D588              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 439++D588              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 440++D588              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 441++D588              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 441++D588 3A 7D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 441++D58B 32 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 442++D58E                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 442++D58E 3A 84 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 442++D591 32 C1 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 443++D594                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 443++D594 3A 73 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 443++D597 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 444++D59A 3A 75 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 445++D59D CD E1 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 446++D5A0 DA 33 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 447++D5A3 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 448++D5A6                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 448++D5A6 3A C1 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 448++D5A9 32 7E C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 449++D5AC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 449++D5AC 3A 79 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 449++D5AF 32 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 450++D5B2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 450++D5B2 3A 80 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 450++D5B5 32 C1 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 451++D5B8                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 451++D5B8 3A 6D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 451++D5BB 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 452++D5BE 3A 6F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 453++D5C1 CD E1 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 454++D5C4 DA 33 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 455++D5C7 32 79 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 456++D5CA                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 456++D5CA 3A C1 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 456++D5CD 32 7A C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 457++D5D0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 457++D5D0 3A 7B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 457++D5D3 32 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 458++D5D6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 458++D5D6 3A 82 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 458++D5D9 32 C1 97    >                        ld       (varS),a
 459++D5DC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 459++D5DC 3A 70 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 459++D5DF 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 460++D5E2 3A 72 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 461++D5E5 CD E1 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 462++D5E8 DA 33 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 463++D5EB 32 7B C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 464++D5EE                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 464++D5EE 3A C1 97    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 464++D5F1 32 7C C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 465++D5F4              ; calculate dot product LL89
 466++D5F4              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 466++D5F4 3A 7F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 466++D5F7 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 467++D5FA 3A 79 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 468++D5FD CD 4D AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 469++D600 32 DC 97                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 470++D603 3A 80 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 471++D606 21 7A C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 472++D609 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 473++D60A 32 C1 97                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 474++D60D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 474++D60D 3A 81 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 474++D610 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 475++D613 3A 7B C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 476++D616 CD 4D AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 477++D619 32 BF 97                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 478++D61C                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 478++D61C 3A DC 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 478++D61F 32 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 479++D622 3A 82 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 480++D625 21 7C C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 481++D628 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 482++D629 CD E1 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 483++D62C 32 DC 97                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 484++D62F                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 484++D62F 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 484++D632 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 485++D635 3A 7D C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 486++D638 CD 4D AE                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 487++D63B 32 BF 97                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 488++D63E                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 488++D63E 3A DC 97    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 488++D641 32 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),a
 489++D644 3A 7E C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 490++D647 21 84 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 491++D64A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 492++D64B CD E1 AE                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 493++D64E FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 494++D650 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 495++D652 3A C1 97                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 496++D655 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 497++D658 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 498++D65A 3A 5B D4     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 499++D65D CD 43 D0                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 500++D660 C3 69 D6                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 501++D663 3A 5B D4     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 502++D666 CD 3A D0                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 503++D669 21 5B D4     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 504++D66C 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 505++D66D C1                                   pop         bc
 506++D66E E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 507++D66F 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 508++D671 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 509++D673 22 B3 96                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 510++D676 05                                   dec         b
 511++D677 C2 13 D5                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 512++D67A C9                                   ret
 513++D67B
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
