 849+ D67B              ; Process edges
 850+ D67B              ; .....................................................
 851+ D67B              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
 852+ D67B ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 853+ D67B ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 854+ D67B ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 855+ D67B ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 856+ D67B ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 857+ D67B ~            NodeXPositive\1
 857+ D67B ~
 858+ D67B ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 859+ D67B ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 860+ D67B ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 861+ D67B ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 862+ D67B ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 863+ D67B ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 864+ D67B ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 865+ D67B ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 866+ D67B ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
 867+ D67B ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 868+ D67B ~            NodeNegative\1
 868+ D67B ~
 869+ D67B ~            LL52\1
 869+ D67B ~                                                              ;
 870+ D67B ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
 871+ D67B ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
 872+ D67B ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 873+ D67B ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 874+ D67B ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 875+ D67B ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
 875+ D67B ~
 876+ D67B ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 877+ D67B ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 878+ D67B ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 879+ D67B ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 880+ D67B ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 881+ D67B ~            SetAndMop\1
 881+ D67B ~
 882+ D67B ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 883+ D67B ~            FinishedThisNode\1
 884+ D67B                                  ENDM

 894+ D689              NodeXPositiveX:

 983+ D725              LL56Overflow:

1117+ D809 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1118+ D80B EB                   ex          de,hl
1119+ D80C              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1120+ D80C FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1121+ D80F FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1122+ D812 FD 23                inc         iy
1123+ D814 FD 23                inc         iy
1124+ D816 C9                   ret
1125+ D817              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1126+ D817              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1127+ D817              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1128+ D817              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1129+ D817              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1130+ D817              CopyNodeToXX15:
1131+ D817                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1131+ D817 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1131+ D818 32 79 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1132+ D81B 23                   inc         hl
1133+ D81C                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1133+ D81C 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1133+ D81D 32 7B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1134+ D820 23                   inc         hl
1135+ D821                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1135+ D821 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1135+ D822 32 7D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1136+ D825 23                   inc         hl
1137+ D826              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1138+ D826              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1139+ D826 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1140+ D827 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1141+ D828 47                   ld          b,a
1142+ D829 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1143+ D82B 32 7A C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1144+ D82E 78                   ld          a,b
1145+ D82F E6 40                and         $40
1146+ D831 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1147+ D833 32 7C C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1148+ D836 78                   ld          a,b
1149+ D837 E6 20                and         $20
1150+ D839 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1151+ D83B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1152+ D83D 32 7E C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1153+ D840 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1154+ D841 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1155+ D843 32 DC 97             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1156+ D846 C9                   ret
1157+ D847
1158+ D847              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1159+ D847              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1160+ D847              ;..............................................................................................................................
1161+ D847              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1162+ D847              LL48GetScale:
1163+ D847 3A A3 96             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1164+ D84A 5F                   ld          e,a
1165+ D84B CD 17 D8             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1166+ D84E              LL48GetVertices:
1167+ D84E              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1168+ D84E                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1168+ D84E BB          >                        cp      e
1168+ D84F DA 90 D8    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1169+ D852              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1170+ D852                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1170+ D852 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1170+ D853 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1170+ D854 32 AE 96    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1171+ D857 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1172+ D858 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1173+ D85A E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1174+ D85B                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1174+ D85B 21 A6 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1174+ D85E ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1174+ D860 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1175+ D861 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1176+ D862                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1176+ D862 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1176+ D864 C2 96 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1177+ D867              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1178+ D867 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1179+ D868 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1180+ D86A E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1181+ D86C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1181+ D86C FE 00       >                        cp	0
1181+ D86E C2 96 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1182+ D871              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1183+ D871                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1183+ D871 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1183+ D872 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1183+ D873 32 AE 96    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1184+ D876 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1185+ D877 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1186+ D879 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1187+ D87A                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1187+ D87A 21 A6 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1187+ D87D ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1187+ D87F 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1188+ D880 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1189+ D881                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1189+ D881 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1189+ D883 C2 96 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1190+ D886              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1191+ D886 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1192+ D887 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1193+ D889 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1194+ D88B                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1194+ D88B FE 00       >                        cp	0
1194+ D88D C2 96 D8    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1195+ D890              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1196+ D890 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1197+ D893 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1198+ D895                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1199+ D895 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1200+ D896              NodeIsVisible:
1201+ D896              LL49:
1202+ D896 CD 39 D7             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1203+ D899 C9                   ret
1204+ D89A
1205+ D89A
1206+ D89A              ProjectNodeToEye:
1207+ D89A ED 4B 7D C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1208+ D89E 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1209+ D89F 32 BF 97     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1210+ D8A2 3A 79 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1211+ D8A5 CD C2 A9     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1212+ D8A8 3A 7A C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1213+ D8AB                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1213+ D8AB CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1213+ D8AD C2 B8 D8    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1214+ D8B0              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1215+ D8B0 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1216+ D8B2 26 00            ld          h,0
1217+ D8B4 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1218+ D8B5 C3 BF D8         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1219+ D8B8              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1220+ D8B8 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1221+ D8BA 26 00            ld          h,0
1222+ D8BC                  ClearCarryFlag
1222+ D8BC B7          >                        or a
1223+ D8BD ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1224+ D8BF              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1225+ D8BF EB               ex          de,hl
1226+ D8C0 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1227+ D8C3 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1228+ D8C6              EyeProcessYPoint:
1229+ D8C6 ED 4B 7D C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1230+ D8CA 79           	ld			a,c
1231+ D8CB 32 BF 97     	ld			(varQ),a
1232+ D8CE 3A 7B C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1233+ D8D1 CD C2 A9     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1234+ D8D4 3A 7C C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1235+ D8D7                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1235+ D8D7 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1235+ D8D9 C2 E4 D8    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1236+ D8DC              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1237+ D8DC 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1238+ D8DE                  ClearCarryFlag
1238+ D8DE B7          >                        or a
1239+ D8DF ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1240+ D8E1 C3 E9 D8         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1241+ D8E4              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1242+ D8E4 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1243+ D8E6 26 00            ld          h,0
1244+ D8E8 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1245+ D8E9              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1246+ D8E9 EB               ex          de,hl
1247+ D8EA FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1248+ D8ED FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1249+ D8F0 C9               ret
1250+ D8F1
1251+ D8F1
1252+ D8F1
1253+ D8F1              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1254+ D8F1              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1255+ D8F1              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1256+ D8F1              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1257+ D8F1              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1258+ D8F1              ; which can be simplified as:
1259+ D8F1              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1260+ D8F1              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1261+ D8F1              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1262+ D8F1              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1263+ D8F1              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1264+ D8F1              ;      Roll calculations:
1265+ D8F1              ;
1266+ D8F1              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1267+ D8F1              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1268+ D8F1              ;      Pitch calculations:
1269+ D8F1              ;
1270+ D8F1              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1271+ D8F1              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1272+ D8F1
1273+ D8F1
1274+ D8F1              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1275+ D8F1                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D8F1
   2++D8F1              ; Full version
   3++D8F1              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D8F1              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D8F1              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D8F1              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D8F1
   8++D8F1
   9++D8F1              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D8F1             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D8F1 3A CB 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D8F4 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D8F7             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D8F7 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D8FA 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D8FD             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D8FD 3A 21 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D900 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D903 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D906 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D908 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D90B ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D90F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D90F 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D912 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D915 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D918 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D91B ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D91F C9                                   ret
  11++D920              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++D920             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++D920 3A CB 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++D923 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++D926             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++D926 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++D929 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D92C             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++D92C 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D92F 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++D932 3A 16 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++D935 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++D937 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++D93A ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++D93E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++D93E 2A 15 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D941 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D944 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++D947 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++D94A ED 53 15 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++D94E C9                                   ret
  13++D94F              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++D94F             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  13++D94F 3A CB 96    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  13++D952 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++D955             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++D955 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  13++D958 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D95B             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  13++D95B 3A 1B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D95E 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  13++D961 3A 1C C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  13++D964 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  13++D966 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  13++D969 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  13++D96D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++D96D 2A 1B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D970 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D973 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++D976 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++D979 ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++D97D C9                                   ret
  15++D97E
  16++D97E              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  16++D97E             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  16++D97E 3A BA 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  16++D981 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  16++D984             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  16++D984 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  16++D987 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++D98A             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  16++D98A 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++D98D 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  16++D990 3A 26 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  16++D993 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  16++D995 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  16++D998 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  16++D99C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  16++D99C 2A 25 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++D99F 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++D9A2 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  16++D9A5 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  16++D9A8 ED 53 25 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  17++D9AC C9                                   ret
  18++D9AD              ApplyMyPitchToSidev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  18++D9AD             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  18++D9AD 3A BA 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  18++D9B0 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  18++D9B3             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  18++D9B3 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  18++D9B6 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++D9B9             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  18++D9B9 3A 19 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++D9BC 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  18++D9BF 3A 1A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  18++D9C2 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  18++D9C4 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  18++D9C7 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  18++D9CB             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  18++D9CB 2A 19 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++D9CE 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++D9D1 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  18++D9D4 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  18++D9D7 ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  19++D9DB C9                                   ret
  20++D9DC              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  20++D9DC             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  20++D9DC 3A BA 96    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  20++D9DF 32 BF 97    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  20++D9E2             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  20++D9E2 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  20++D9E5 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++D9E8             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  20++D9E8 3A 1F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D9EB 32 AE 96    >                        ld       (varP),a
  20++D9EE 3A 20 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  20++D9F1 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  20++D9F3 CD B7 A7    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  20++D9F6 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  20++D9FA             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++D9FA 2A 1F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D9FD 22 C0 97    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++DA00 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  20++DA03 CD B7 A7    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  20++DA06 ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  21++DA0A C9                                   ret
  22++DA0B
  23++DA0B
  24++DA0B              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++DA0B ~                                    push    bc
  26++DA0B ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++DA0B ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++DA0B ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++DA0B ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++DA0B ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++DA0B ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++DA0B ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++DA0B ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++DA0B ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++DA0B ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++DA0B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++DA0B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++DA0B ~                                    pop     bc
  39++DA0B ~                                    ret
  40++DA0B ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++DA0B ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++DA0B ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++DA0B ~                                    or      a
  44++DA0B ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++DA0B ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++DA0B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++DA0B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++DA0B ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++DA0B ~                                    pop     bc
  50++DA0B ~                                    ret
  51++DA0B ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++DA0B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++DA0B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++DA0B ~                                    pop     bc
  55++DA0B ~                                    ret
  56++DA0B                                      ENDM
  57++DA0B
  58++DA0B
  59++DA0B              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++DA0B C5          >                        push    bc
  59++DA0C 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++DA0D 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++DA10 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++DA11 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++DA12 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++DA13 FA 24 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++DA16             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++DA16 ED 5B AF 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++DA1A 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA1D 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++DA1E 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++DA21 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++DA22 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA23 C9          >                        ret
  59++DA24             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++DA24 ED 5B AF 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++DA28 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA2B B7          >                        or      a
  59++DA2C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++DA2E 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++DA30 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++DA31 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++DA34 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++DA36 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA37 C9          >                        ret
  59++DA38             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++DA38 AF          >                    xor a
  59++DA39 95          >                    sub l
  59++DA3A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++DA3B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++DA3C 94          >                    sub h
  59++DA3D 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++DA3E 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++DA41 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++DA42 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA43 C9          >                        ret
  60++DA44
  61++DA44              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++DA44 C5          >                        push    bc
  61++DA45 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++DA46 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++DA49 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++DA4A 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++DA4B A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++DA4C FA 5D DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++DA4F             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++DA4F ED 5B AF 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++DA53 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DA56 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++DA57 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++DA5A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++DA5B C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA5C C9          >                        ret
  61++DA5D             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++DA5D ED 5B AF 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++DA61 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DA64 B7          >                        or      a
  61++DA65 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++DA67 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++DA69 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++DA6A 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++DA6D EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++DA6F C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA70 C9          >                        ret
  61++DA71             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++DA71 AF          >                    xor a
  61++DA72 95          >                    sub l
  61++DA73 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++DA74 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++DA75 94          >                    sub h
  61++DA76 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++DA77 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++DA7A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++DA7B C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DA7C C9          >                        ret
  62++DA7D
  63++DA7D              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++DA7D C5          >                        push    bc
  63++DA7E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++DA7F 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++DA82 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++DA83 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++DA84 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++DA85 FA 96 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++DA88             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++DA88 ED 5B AF 96 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++DA8C 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DA8F 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++DA90 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++DA93 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++DA94 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DA95 C9          >                        ret
  63++DA96             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++DA96 ED 5B AF 96 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++DA9A 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DA9D B7          >                        or      a
  63++DA9E ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++DAA0 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++DAA2 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++DAA3 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++DAA6 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++DAA8 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DAA9 C9          >                        ret
  63++DAAA             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++DAAA AF          >                    xor a
  63++DAAB 95          >                    sub l
  63++DAAC 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++DAAD 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++DAAE 94          >                    sub h
  63++DAAF 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++DAB0 22 AF 96    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++DAB3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++DAB4 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DAB5 C9          >                        ret
  64++DAB6
  65++DAB6              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++DAB6 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++DAB9              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++DAB9              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++DAB9              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++DAB9
  71++DAB9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++DAB9              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++DAB9 3A CC 96     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++DABC 21 BC 96                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++DABF B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++DAC0 CA 7A DB                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++DAC3                                      ;break
  78++DAC3              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++DAC3 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++DAC4 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++DAC7 CD 13 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++DACA 32 B0 96                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++DACD 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++DAD0              ; A = Flip sign
  85++DAD0 3A CE 96                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++DAD3 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++DAD6 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++DAD7              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++DAD7 CD 44 DA                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++DADA              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++DADA 32 B8 DA                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++DADD 22 B6 DA                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++DAE0              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++DAE0 3A BC 96                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++DAE3 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++DAE4 CD 13 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++DAE7 32 B0 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++DAEA 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++DAED              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++DAED 3A B8 DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++DAF0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++DAF1 3A BD 96                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++DAF4 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++DAF5              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++DAF5 CD 7D DA                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++DAF8 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++DAFB 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++DAFE              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++DAFE 3A BC 96                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++DB01 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++DB02 CD 13 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++DB05 32 B0 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++DB08 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++DB0B              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++DB0B 3A B8 DA                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++DB0E 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++DB11 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++DB12 3A BD 96                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++DB15 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++DB16 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++DB17 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++DB1A AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++DB1B F2 2A DB                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++DB1E 2A AF 96                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++DB21 ED 5B B6 DA                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++DB25 B7                                   or      a
 127++DB26 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++DB27 C3 44 DB                             jp      .MV44
 129++DB2A 2A B6 DA     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++DB2D ED 5B AF 96                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++DB31 B7                                   or      a
 132++DB32 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++DB34 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++DB36                                      NegHL
 134++DB36 AF          >                    xor a
 134++DB37 95          >                    sub l
 134++DB38 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++DB39 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++DB3A 94          >                    sub h
 134++DB3B 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++DB3C 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++DB3F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++DB41 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++DB44              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++DB44 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++DB47 3A CC 96                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++DB4A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++DB4B 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++DB4E CD 13 A8                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++DB51 32 B0 96                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++DB54 22 AE 96                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++DB57 3A CD 96                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++DB5A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++DB5B 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++DB5E AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++DB5F CD 0B DA                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++DB62 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++DB65 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++DB68                                      ;break
 154++DB68                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++DB68
 156++DB68 CD F1 D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++DB6B CD 20 D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++DB6E CD 4F D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++DB71 CD 7E D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++DB74 CD AD D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++DB77 CD DC D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++DB7A 3A BB 97     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++DB7D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++DB7F 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++DB80 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++DB83 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++DB86 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++DB87 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++DB89 CD C3 AD                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++DB8C 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++DB8F 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++DB92 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1276+ DB93                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++DB93              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DB93              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++DB93 3A 2B C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++DB96 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++DB97 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++DB99 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++DB9A 32 32 C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++DB9D 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++DB9E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++DBA0 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++DBA2 FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++DBA4 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++DBA6 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++DBA7 32 33 C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++DBAA 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++DBAB B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++DBAC 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++DBAF 21 1B C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++DBB2 22 97 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++DBB5 21 21 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++DBB8 22 99 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++DBBB CD 61 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++DBBE 21 1D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++DBC1 22 97 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++DBC4 21 23 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++DBC7 22 99 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++DBCA CD 61 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++DBCD 21 1F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++DBD0 22 97 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++DBD3 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++DBD6 22 99 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++DBD9 CD 61 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++DBDC 3A 2A C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++DBDF 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++DBE0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++DBE2 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++DBE3 32 32 C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++DBE6 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++DBE7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++DBE9 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++DBEA FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++DBEC 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++DBEE 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++DBEF 32 33 C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++DBF2 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++DBF3 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++DBF4 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++DBF7 21 1B C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++DBFA 22 97 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++DBFD 21 15 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++DC00 22 99 96                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++DC03 CD 61 CB                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++DC06 21 1D C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++DC09 22 97 96                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl

   5++DD8D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DD8D              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DD8D               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DD8D 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DD8E
  10++DD8E              PrepLines:
  11++DD8E              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DD8E
  13++DD8E              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DD8E              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DD8E              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DD8E              ;        or          8
  17++DD8E              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DD8E              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DD8E              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DD8E              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DD8E              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DD8E              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DD8E              ;
  24++DD8E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DD8E              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DD8E                      ;break
  27++DD8E                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DD8E AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DD8F 32 F6 C2    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DD92                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DD92 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DD93 32 F7 C2    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DD96                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DD96 AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DD97 32 8D DD    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DD9A 3A 0D C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DD9D DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DD9F FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DDA2 21 04 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DDA5 22 C2 97             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DDA8                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DDA8 3A 0D C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DDAB 32 C6 97    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DDAE 3A 2C C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DDB1                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DDB1 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DDB3 CA BB DD    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DDB6 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DDB8 32 2C C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DDBB              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DDBB              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DDBB              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DDBB              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DDBB              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DDBB 21 49 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DDBE                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DDBE 22 B3 96             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DDC1 3A 09 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DDC4 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DDC5              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DDC5              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DDC5 2A B3 96             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DDC8 E5                   push        hl
  54++DDC9 FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DDCB                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DDCB ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DDCB                      ENDIF
  58++DDCB 3A A3 96             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DDCE 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DDCF              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DDCF FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DDD2                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DDD2 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DDD3 DA 26 DE    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DDD6              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DDD6              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DDD6              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DDD6 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DDD9 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DDDA E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DDDC                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DDDC 21 A6 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DDDF ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DDE1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DDE2              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DDE2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DDE2 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  71++DDE4 C2 F8 DD    >                        jp	nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DDE7              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DDE7 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DDE8 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DDEA E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DDEC E5                   push        hl
  77++DDED                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DDED 21 A6 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DDF0 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DDF2 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DDF3 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DDF4                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DDF4 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DDF5 CA 26 DE    >                        jp	z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DDF8              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DDF8              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DDF8              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DDF8 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DDFB CD 69 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DDFE FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DE01 CD 7B DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DE04 CD D9 CC             call        ClipLine
  88++DE07 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DE09              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DE09 ED 5B C2 97          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DE0D 21 79 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DE10                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DE10 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE12 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE14 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE16 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DE18 ED 53 C2 97          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DE1C 21 F6 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DE1F 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DE20 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DE21                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DE21 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DE23 D2 3C DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DE26              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DE26              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DE26              LL78:
 101++DE26 2A B3 96             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DE29 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DE2B ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DE2D 22 B3 96             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DE30 21 8D DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DE33 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DE34 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DE35                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DE35 21 C6 97    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DE38 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DE39 C2 C5 DD    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DE3C              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DE3C              LL81:
 111++DE3C              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DE3C 3A F6 C2             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DE3F CB 27                sla         a
 114++DE41 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DE43 32 F7 C2             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DE46              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DE46 C9                   ret
 118++DE47
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1448+ DE47
1449+ DE47              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1450+ DE47
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm
